Name_ZH: His Excellency Omar Sultan Al Olama
Name_EN: His Excellency Omar Sultan Al Olama
Title_ZH: Minister of State for Artificial Intelligence, Digital Economy, and Remote Work Applications
Title_EN: Minister of State for Artificial Intelligence, Digital Economy, and Remote Work Applications
Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 CSV 中补充）
Biography_EN: His Excellency Omar Sultan Al Olama，您在United Arab Emirates担任Minister of State for Artificial Intelligence, Digital Economy, and Remote Work Applications期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_ZH: As the Minister of State for Artificial Intelligence, Digital Economy, and Remote Work Applications at United Arab Emirates, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: 何一是币安联合创始人，自 2017 年币安上线以来一直主导公司的整体业务与品牌战略，将其在短短六个月内发展为全球最大的加密货币交易所之一，并推动平台从单一加密货币现货撮合，转型为覆盖区块链生态各版块的全球化业务矩阵。 在此之前，她曾担任移动视频科技公司一下科技副总裁，负责品牌与市场运营，并主导募资相关工作，帮助公司估值提升至超过 30 亿美元；更早在 2014–2015 年间，她也是数字资产交易平台 OKCoin 的联合创始人之一，在其任内，OKCoin 在中国市场份额在熊市环境下仍提升约 60%，成为当时亚洲主流数字资产交易所之一。 她长期致力于在加密行业推动透明度、社区赋能与经济自由理念，并通过在多家加密公司担任高管，带动更多女性进入高层管理岗位，在男性占主导的科技与加密行业中树立了女性领导者的信任与示范。
Biography_EN: Yi He is the Co-Founder of Binance. Since Binance's launch in 2017, Yi has led the business strategy, which saw the company successfully become the world’s largest crypto exchange within the span of six months. Yi also pivoted the company to a global blockchain ecosystem from just a crypto-to-crypto trading platform. Before co-founding Binance, Yi served as Vice President at Yixia Technology, the leading mobile video tech company behind popular mobile apps like Miaopai, Xiaokaxiu and Yizhibo, where she led branding strategy and marketing operations and was a fundamental part of the fundraising strategy that drove the firm’s valuation to USD$3+ billion. Yi was also co-founder of the digital asset exchange OKCoin between 2014 and 2015. Under her leadership at OKCoin, the company’s market share in China increased by 60% during a bear market to become the dominant digital asset exchange in Asia. Yi is passionate about providing transparency and empowering communities in the cryptocurrency industry and championing economic freedom. Throughout her successful leadership in crypto companies, Yi helped to create a trend of hiring female executives in the male-dominant tech industry and gained the crypto market’s trust in women leaders.
Interview1_ZH: Yi He，您在Binance担任Co-Founder & Chief Customer Service Officer期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder & Chief Customer Service Officer at Binance, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 过去几年，币安从单一交易平台升级为多链、多业务的全球生态，你在推动这一转型时，哪一次“踩坑”经历最让你印象深刻？它如何改变了你对用户与产品迭代的思考方式？
Interview2_EN: In recent years, Binance has evolved from a single exchange into a multi‑chain, multi‑product global ecosystem. What was the most memorable “mistake” or setback during this transition, and how did it change the way you think about users and product iteration?
Interview3_ZH: 作为在行业内最早推动女性高管进入加密公司决策层的人之一，你认为 2025 年想进入 Web3 的年轻女性和中国职场女性，最应该培养的三项具体能力是什么？
Interview3_EN: As one of the earliest leaders pushing for more female executives in crypto, what are the three most concrete skills young women and Chinese professionals should build if they want to break into Web3 leadership in 2025?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Richard Teng 拥有逾 30 年金融服务及监管领域经验，自 2023 年 11 月起出任币安首席执行官，通过与监管机构、政策制定者、行业参与者及用户等多方紧密合作，推动币安在合规与可持续框架下持续发展。 在此之前，他自 2021 年 8 月加入币安，相继负责新加坡业务以及中东、欧洲等区域市场，并出任全球区域市场负责人；在加入币安前，曾担任阿布扎比国际金融中心（ADGM）金融服务监管局首席执行官、新加坡交易所首席监管官以及新加坡金融管理局公司融资部主任等职务。 他取得西澳大学应用金融硕士学位，并在监管与市场建设方面被视为全球较具创新精神的监管人士之一。
Biography_EN: Richard Teng is an experienced executive with over three decades of financial services and regulatory experience. Richard has been the CEO of Binance since his appointment in November 2023. By working closely with various stakeholders including regulators, policymakers, industry players and users, Richard is furthering the growth of Binance in a compliant and sustainable manner. Prior to this role, Richard held various senior leadership roles within the company since joining in August 2021. Before joining Binance, Richard was CEO of the Financial Services Regulatory Authority at Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), where he showcased his capabilities as one of the world’s foremost innovative regulators. Richard’s vast experience also includes being the Chief Regulatory Officer of the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and the Director of Corporate Finance in the Monetary Authority of Singapore. Richard received his Masters in Applied Finance from the University of Western Australia.
Interview1_ZH: Richard Teng，您在Binance担任CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CEO at Binance, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在多国监管体系中都担任过关键角色，如今站在交易所一侧，你觉得“好监管”和“好创新”之间真正的平衡点在哪里？有没有一个你亲自参与的案例可以分享？
Interview2_EN: Having served in key roles across multiple regulatory regimes and now leading an exchange, where do you see the real balance between “good regulation” and “good innovation,” and can you share a case where you personally helped strike that balance?
Interview3_ZH: 2025 年全球合规版图变化很快，你如何判断一个新市场是否值得 Binance 重点投入？在你自己的评估模型中，最重要的三项指标是什么？
Interview3_EN: With the global compliance landscape shifting rapidly in 2025, how do you decide whether a new jurisdiction is worth major Binance investment, and what are the top three indicators in your own evaluation framework?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Title_ZH: BWT Alpine Formula One Team Driver
Title_EN: BWT Alpine Formula One Team Driver
Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 CSV 中补充）
Interview1_ZH: Pierre Gasly，您在贵团队担任BWT Alpine Formula One Team Driver期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the BWT Alpine Formula One Team Driver at your team, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 作为 F1 车手，你亲身感受过极限速度与实时决策。如果把一场大奖赛比作一次高波动市场行情，你会如何向普通投资者解释“何时该冒险，何时该收油门”？
Interview2_EN: As an F1 driver, you live with extreme speed and real‑time decision‑making. If a Grand Prix were a high‑volatility market move, how would you explain to everyday investors “when to push and when to ease off the throttle”?
Interview3_ZH: 越来越多车队和车手开始尝试 NFT、粉丝代币等新工具，你个人会如何想象一场完全数字化、链上可验证的 F1 粉丝体验？其中最需要被解决的一项现实问题是什么？
Interview3_EN: As more teams and drivers experiment with NFTs and fan tokens, how do you personally imagine a fully digital, on‑chain verifiable F1 fan experience, and what is the single biggest real‑world problem that must be solved to get there?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH:
Michael Saylor 是 Strategy（股票代码：MSTR）的创始人兼执行董事长，这是一家成立于 1989 年的上市商业智能公司，同时也是持有 649,870 枚（且仍在增加）比特币 
 的机构之一。Michael 也是 Alarm.com（股票代码：ALRM）的创始人，拥有 48 项以上专利发明，并著有《The Mobile Wave》一书。他创立了非营利组织 Saylor Academy（saylor.org），已为超过 200 万名学生提供免费教育。他积极倡导“比特币标准”（hope.com），并拥有麻省理工学院授予的航空航天工程和科学史双学位。他在 X 平台上以 @saylor 账号发表观点，并运营个人网站 Michael.com；他与 Lex Fridman 时长约 4 小时的访谈视频，系统阐述了其对比特币、通胀及货币未来的看法，在 YouTube 上已有约 1100 万次观看。
Biography_EN: Michael Saylor is the Founder & Executive Chairman of Strategy (MSTR), a publicly traded business intelligence firm & holder of ₿649,870 (and counting) that he founded in 1989. He is also the founder of Alarm.com (ALRM), named inventor on 48+ patents, & author of the book “The Mobile Wave”. He founded the Saylor Academy (saylor.org), a non-profit that has provided free education to over 2 million students. He is an advocate for the Bitcoin Standard (hope.com) with dual degrees from MIT in Aerospace Engineering & History of Science. He posts his views on X @saylor and his website Michael.com. His 4 hour interview with Lex Fridman summarizes his thoughts on Bitcoin, Inflation, and the Future of Money with ~11 million views on YouTube.
Interview1_ZH: Michael Saylor，您在Strategy担任Founder & Executive Chairman期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder & Executive Chairman at Strategy, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 过去几年你多次在宏观高利率环境下继续买入 Bitcoin，你内部用来判断“继续加仓还是保持耐心”的那套宏观与链上信号，可以向我们拆解一两个关键变量吗？
Interview2_EN: Over the past few years you kept buying Bitcoin even in a high‑rate macro environment. In your internal framework for deciding whether to keep accumulating or stay patient, can you walk us through one or two of the key macro or on‑chain variables you watch most closely?
Interview3_ZH: 你曾写过关于“移动浪潮”，现在又成为“比特币标准”的代表人物。如果把这两次技术范式迁移放在一条时间轴上，你认为普通人和机构在这一次迁移中最容易犯的战略性错误是什么？
Interview3_EN: You once wrote about “The Mobile Wave” and are now a leading voice for the Bitcoin Standard. If you place these two paradigm shifts on a single timeline, what is the most common strategic mistake you see individuals and institutions making in this current transition?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Brad 现任 Ripple 首席执行官并担任公司董事会成员。在加入 Ripple 之前，他曾担任文件协作服务公司 Hightail 的首席执行官。2009 至 2012 年间，他在 AOL 出任消费者应用事业总裁，在此之前自 2003 至 2008 年在 Yahoo! 担任多个高管职位，包括高级副总裁。其职业生涯早期，Brad 曾担任 Dialpad Communications 的首席执行官，推动了 VoIP 行业的早期发展。他还曾在多家公司担任董事会职务，包括 Ancestry.com 和 Tonic Health（后被 R1 RCM 收购）。
Biography_EN: Brad is the CEO of Ripple and a member of the Board of Directors. Prior to Ripple, Brad served as the CEO of file collaboration service Hightail. From 2009 to 2012 he was President of Consumer Applications at AOL and prior to that he held various executive positions at Yahoo! from 2003 to 2008, including Senior Vice President. Earlier in his career, Brad helped to pioneer the VoIP industry as CEO of Dialpad Communications. He has previously held several board positions at companies including Ancestry.com and Tonic Health (acquired by R1 RCM).
Interview1_ZH: Brad Garlinghouse，您在Ripple担任CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CEO at Ripple, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 过去几年，你在多国法院和监管机构前为 Ripple 和行业发声。回望这段历程，你认为哪些误解在 2025 年已经被澄清，哪些误解依然顽固存在？
Interview2_EN: In recent years you have defended Ripple and the industry in courts and with regulators around the world. Looking back, which misconceptions do you think have finally been cleared up by 2025, and which stubborn misconceptions still persist?
Interview3_ZH: 你经常谈到跨境支付的“真正痛点”。如果让你从企业客户的一封真实邮件或电话记录中抽取一句话，哪一句最能代表他们对加密和区块链解决方案的核心诉求？
Interview3_EN: You often talk about the “real pain points” in cross‑border payments. If you had to quote a single line from an actual enterprise client email or call, what sentence best captures their core demand for crypto and blockchain solutions?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH:
Raoul 是 Real Vision Group 的联合创始人兼首席执行官，该公司是全球领先的金融知识与媒体平台之一。此外，他出版发行独立宏观投资策略研究服务《Global Macro Investor》，并担任数字资产对冲基金母基金 EXPAAM 的联合创始人兼首席执行官。此前，Raoul 曾在 Goldman Sachs 
 工作，后来在 GLG Partners 负责并管理全球宏观对冲基金业务。他目前居住在开曼群岛。
Biography_EN: Raoul is the Co-Founder and CEO of Real Vision Group, one of the world’s leading financial knowledge and media platforms. Additionally, he publishes the Global Macro Investor, a renowned independent macro investment strategy service and is the Co-Founder/CEO of EXPAAM, a Fund of Digital Asset Hedge Funds. Formerly Raoul worked for Goldman Sachs and later ran the global macro hedge fund for GLG Partners. He lives in the Cayman Islands.
Interview1_ZH: Raoul Pal，您在Real Vision担任Co-Founder & CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder & CEO at Real Vision, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你长期在 Global Macro Investor 跟踪债券、股市与加密的联动。站在 2025 年这个时点，你最担心的一个“被低估的宏观风险”是什么？它会如何意外影响加密市场？
Interview2_EN: You’ve long tracked the interplay between bonds, equities, and crypto in Global Macro Investor. As of 2025, what is the most “under‑priced macro risk” on your radar, and how could it unexpectedly spill over into crypto markets?
Interview3_ZH: Real Vision 的内容覆盖面越来越广，如果你只能为刚进入 Web3 的传统金融从业者设计一条“学习路径”，你会推荐他们按怎样的顺序去理解宏观、技术与链上数据？
Interview3_EN: As Real Vision’s content universe expands, if you could design a single “learning path” for a TradFi professional new to Web3, in what order should they get to grips with macro, technology, and on‑chain data?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 CSV 中补充）
Interview1_ZH: CZ ​，您在Giggle Academy & Binance担任Founder & Co-Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder & Co-Founder at Giggle Academy & Binance, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 如果把你在币安和 Web3 里的第一阶段看作“从 0 到 1”，你现在正在投入的项目中，哪一项更像是“从 1 到 N”的长期基础设施？它解决的核心痛点是什么？
Interview2_EN: If your first phase at Binance and in Web3 was “zero to one,” among the projects you are focusing on now, which one feels most like “one to many” long‑term infrastructure, and what core pain point is it solving?
Interview3_ZH: 你经常提到“简单”是好产品的最高境界。站在 2025 年，如果要你给年轻创业者三条完全不谈估值、只谈“如何把产品做简单”的建议，你会说什么？
Interview3_EN: You often say that true product excellence is about simplicity. From your 2025 vantage point, what three pieces of advice would you give young founders that ignore valuation entirely and focus only on “how to make products truly simple”?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Alex 是 Coin Bureau 的主持人。
Biography_EN: Presenter at Coin Bureau
Interview1_ZH: Guy Turner，您在Coin Bureau担任Co-Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder at Coin Bureau, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 作为 Coin Bureau 的内容主理人，你每天要在噪音和信号之间做选择。你现在用什么具体标准来判断一个新叙事值得做 20 分钟深度视频，而不是 2 分钟快讯？
Interview2_EN: As the driving force behind Coin Bureau, you constantly choose between noise and signal. What specific criteria do you now use to decide whether a new narrative deserves a 20‑minute deep‑dive video instead of a 2‑minute news bite?
Interview3_ZH: 你运营了多个细分频道，如果把它们看作一个“加密教育实验室”，有哪些你没想到会爆红、却意外证明用户真实需求的内容形式或系列？
Interview3_EN: You run several niche channels; if you see them as one big “crypto education lab,” which content format or series surprised you by going viral and revealing real user demand you hadn’t anticipated?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Alex 是 Nansen 的首席执行官，拥有人工智能背景，在共同创立 Nansen 之前，曾作为数据科学家和管理顾问工作超过 10 年。作为 Lido Finance 和 PleasrDAO 的早期 DAO 成员，他同时担任 Pudgy Penguins 顾问，并在 Reown 董事会任职。
Biography_EN: Alex is CEO at Nansen. He has a background in AI, with 10+ years experience as data scientist and management consultant before co-founding Nansen in 2019. Alex is one of the initial DAO members of Lido Finance and PleasrDAO, he’s an advisor to Pudgy Penguins, and he serves on the board of Reown.
Interview1_ZH: Alex Svanevik，您在Nansen担任CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CEO at Nansen, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: Nansen 在 2024–2025 年大幅扩展到 AI、钱包画像等新方向。你如何在“数据可视化好看”和“信息真正可交易”之间做取舍？有没有你亲自砍掉过的功能例子？
Interview2_EN: Nansen has expanded into AI and new wallet‑profiling features in 2024–2025. How do you trade off between “beautiful data visualizations” and “information that is actually tradeable,” and can you share a feature you personally decided to kill?
Interview3_ZH: 作为 Lido Finance 和 PleasrDAO 的早期 DAO 成员，你见证了多轮 DAO 热潮与冷却。你认为下一代 DAO 要真正起飞，最需要被重新设计的一个机制是什么？
Interview3_EN: As an early DAO member of Lido Finance and PleasrDAO, you’ve seen multiple hype and cooldown cycles. For the next generation of DAOs to really take off, which single mechanism do you think most urgently needs to be redesigned?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Sandeep Nailwal 是 Polygon 的创始人兼 Polygon 基金会的首席执行官，致力于为去中心化互联网构建基础设施。他与 Polygon Labs 首席执行官 Marc Borion 合作，共同规划协议的长期发展方向。Nailwal 自 2013 年起便投身区块链，从比特币入门，随后在 2017 年推出 Polygon（前身为 Matic），以扩展以太坊的可扩展性。如今，Polygon 支撑支付、RWA 和 Web3 普及，其下一阶段重点是 Agglayer。除 Polygon 外，Nailwal 还是 Sentient 的联合创始人，并发起 Blockchain for Impact 和 Nailwal Fellowship 项目，他拥有 NITIE 的 MBA 学位。
Biography_EN: Sandeep Nailwal is the founder of Polygon and CEO of the Polygon Foundation, building infrastructure for a decentralized internet. He works with Marc Borion, CEO of Polygon Labs, to guide the protocol’s long-term growth. Nailwal began in blockchain with Bitcoin in 2013, later launching Polygon (originally Matic) in 2017 to scale Ethereum. Today, Polygon powers payments, RWAs, and Web3 adoption, with Agglayer as its next frontier. Beyond Polygon, Nailwal co-founded Sentient, launched Blockchain for Impact, and created the Nailwal Fellowship. He holds an MBA from NITIE.
Interview1_ZH: Sandeep Nailwal，您在Polygon Foundation担任Founder & CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder & CEO at Polygon Foundation, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: Polygon 从“以太坊扩容方案”转向多链与 Agglayer 叙事，你如何向非技术用户解释这一转型背后的长期赌注？如果只用一个用户场景做类比，会选什么？
Interview2_EN: Polygon has shifted from “Ethereum scaler” to a multi‑chain and Agglayer narrative. How would you explain this long‑term bet to non‑technical users, and if you had to pick just one user scenario as an analogy, what would it be?
Interview3_ZH: 你经常分享自己从贫困家庭走向 Web3 创业者的故事。站在今天，如果你回到 2013 年刚接触比特币的自己，只能给一句建议，那句建议会是什么？
Interview3_EN: You often share your journey from a modest background to Web3 founder. Looking back from today, if you could tell your 2013 self—just discovering Bitcoin—only one sentence of advice, what would it be?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Christian Angermayer 是一位连续创业者和投资人，致力于塑造“下一代人类议程”，即通过科技让人类活得更长寿、更健康、更幸福。他是全球最积极推动迷幻药物医疗化和人类增强理念的倡导者之一，主张通过科学进步释放人类身心潜能。他的家族办公室 Apeiron Investment Group 以对科技改善人类生活的乐观信念为驱动，秉持创业者精神，以长期、深度参与的方式支持敢于突破想象边界、建设未来世界的创始人和新兴资产管理人。Apeiron 在纽约、伦敦、柏林、阿布扎比和马耳他设有团队，以美国为主要市场采取全球多策略投资路径，直接投资私募和上市公司、自主孵化与启动新企业、作为基石 LP 出资，并持有新兴管理人的少数 GP 股权。目前，Apeiron 管理约 70 亿美元的自有及外部资本，利用自有资产负债表覆盖从孵化早期想法、加速成长型公司到对上市公司进行变革性投资的完整生命周期。
Biography_EN: Christian Angermayer is a serial entrepreneur and investor shaping the Next Human Agenda: a future where technology empowers people to live longer, healthier, and happier lives. He is the world’s leading advocate for the medical use of psychedelics and human enhancement, championing scientific progress to unlock the full physical and mental potential of humanity. His family office, Apeiron Investment Group, is driven by a bold optimism in technology’s power to enhance human life. Entrepreneurial at heart, Christian and Apeiron are hands-on, long-term partners - committed to supporting founders and emerging asset managers who push the boundaries of imagination and build the future we aspire to live in.With teams across New York, London, Berlin, Abu Dhabi, and Malta, Apeiron applies a global, multi-strategy investment approach with a primary focus on the United States. Apeiron invests directly in private and public companies, creates and launches new ventures of its own, anchors LP commitments, and takes minority GP stakes in emerging managers.Today, Apeiron manages approximately $7 billion of internal and external capital. With its proprietary balance sheet, Apeiron invests across the full company lifecycle — from incubating and accelerating breakthrough ideas, to scaling growth-stage businesses, to making transformative investments in listed companies.
Interview1_ZH: Christian Angermayer，您在Apeiron Investment Group担任Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder at Apeiron Investment Group, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在迷幻药医疗化和人类增强领域投入巨大，也积极布局 AI、长寿等前沿科技。你如何评估一个“看起来很科幻”的项目究竟是长期价值资产，还是一阵短期情绪？
Interview2_EN: You invest heavily in medical psychedelics, human enhancement, AI, and longevity. How do you evaluate whether a project that “looks like science fiction” is a long‑term asset or just a short‑lived sentiment trade?
Interview3_ZH: Apeiron 的投资组合横跨 Web3、生命科学和前沿科技，你在实际投后管理中，如何让这些不同领域的创始人互相“碰撞出火花”？有没有一次跨领域协作的案例可以分享？
Interview3_EN: Apeiron’s portfolio spans Web3, life sciences, and frontier tech. In practice, how do you get founders from such different domains to “cross‑pollinate,” and can you share one concrete example of cross‑domain collaboration that worked?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Lily Liu 是一位专注区块链领域的运营者与投资人，现任 Solana 基金会主席并为 Anagram 联合创始人。她曾在美国、中国及多地新兴市场担任首席财务官和运营高管，曾联合创立 Earn.com 并于 2018 年将其出售给 Coinbase。此前，她还担任过中国科诺医疗集团的首席财务官，在中国主导建设一座 500 床位的私立医院，并先后在纽约的 KKR 和纽约、北京的麦肯锡工作。Lily 毕业于斯坦福大学，获经济学与国际关系学学士学位，并在哈佛大学进修东亚研究。
Biography_EN: Lily Liu is an operator and investor focused on the blockchain industry. Lily is the President of the Solana Foundation and Co Founder of Anagram. Lily has a background as a CFO and operating executive in the US, China, and throughout emerging markets. Previously, Lily co-founded Earn.com which was acquired by Coinbase in 2018. She was also the CFO of the Chinaco Healthcare Corporation, where she built a 500-bed private hospital in China. Lily also worked at KKR in New York as well as McKinsey in New York and Beijing. Lily received a BA in Economics and International Relations from Stanford, and studied East Asian Studies at Harvard.
Interview1_ZH: Lily Liu，您在Solana Foundation担任President期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the President at Solana Foundation, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你从 CFO、创业者到 Solana Foundation 总裁，一直在帮助项目从“技术愿景”走向“经济可持续”。你现在判断一个公链生态是否真正健康时，最看重哪三组数据或信号？
Interview2_EN: From CFO and founder to President of the Solana Foundation, you’ve helped projects move from “technical vision” to “economic sustainability.” When you assess whether a Layer‑1 ecosystem is truly healthy today, which three metrics or signals do you value most?
Interview3_ZH: 你在 Earn.com、私立医院建设、投行与咨询都有经历，这些非加密场景中的运营经验，具体是如何影响你今天对 Web3 组织治理与资金使用的判断的？
Interview3_EN: You’ve worked on Earn.com, hospital operations, private equity and consulting. How have those non‑crypto operating experiences specifically shaped the way you judge governance and capital allocation in Web3 organizations today?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Title_ZH: Associate Professor at King Saud University, Director of Web3 and Blockchain Lab
Title_EN: Associate Professor at King Saud University, Director of Web3 and Blockchain Lab
Biography_ZH: Abeer Al‑Humaimeedy 博士是 Web3、区块链与人工智能领域的权威专家，拥有逾 20 年学术与产业经验。她是沙特国王大学区块链与 Web3 实验室的创始人，并担任 AdvancedEra 首席执行官，这是一家推动数字化转型的科技公司。她领导了多项公共部门项目，持有多项区块链、云计算和人工智能相关认证。Abeer 博士在伦敦国王学院获得计算机科学博士学位，并在麻省理工学院斯隆管理学院取得数字商务高管证书，同时活跃于 IEEE Blockchain、Blockchain Council 和 Sigma Xi 等全球社群。
Biography_EN: Dr. Abeer Al-Humaimeedy is a leading expert in Web3, blockchain, and artificial intelligence, with over 20 years of academic and industry experience. She is the founder of the Blockchain and Web3 Lab at King Saud University and CEO of AdvancedEra, a technology firm driving digital transformation. She has led multiple public sector projects and holds certifications in blockchain, cloud, and AI. Dr. Abeer earned her Ph.D. in Computer Science from King’s College London and an Executive Certificate in Digital Business from MIT Sloan School. She is an active member of global communities, including IEEE Blockchain, Blockchain Council, and Sigma Xi.
Interview1_ZH: Abeer Alhumaimeedy，您在King Saud University / Advanced Era担任Associate Professor at King Saud University, Director of Web3 and Blockchain Lab期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Associate Professor at King Saud University, Director of Web3 and Blockchain Lab at King Saud University / Advanced Era, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在大学里搭建了区块链与 Web3 实验室，也在企业一线推动数字化转型。以你在沙特和中东的观察，高校与企业在理解 Web3 时最大的“认知错位”是什么？
Interview2_EN: You built a Blockchain and Web3 Lab at a university while driving digital transformation in industry. From your experience in Saudi Arabia and the wider region, what is the biggest “mindset mismatch” between universities and enterprises when they talk about Web3?
Interview3_ZH: 你同时深耕 AI 与区块链，如果让你设计一门只上四次课的“AI × Web3 应用实践”迷你课程，你会安排哪四个主题？
Interview3_EN: You work deeply in both AI and blockchain. If you had to design a mini‑course of just four sessions on “AI × Web3 in practice,” what four topics would you choose?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Ace 担任币安志愿者（Binance Angel）已有三年时间，通过活动、教育和用户互动等方式服务并支持华语社区。
Biography_EN: Ace has been a Binance Angel for 3 years, supporting the Chinese community through events, education, and user engagement.
Interview1_ZH: Ace Lee，您在贵团队担任Binance Angel期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Binance Angel at your team, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 作为服务华语社区三年的 Binance Angel，你见过用户从小白到“老韭菜”的全过程。你觉得在 2025 年，真正能保护普通用户的不是某个产品功能，而是哪些“思维上的安全设置”？
Interview2_EN: As a Binance Angel serving the Chinese‑speaking community for three years, you’ve watched users go from complete beginners to veterans. In 2025, what “mental safety settings,” rather than product features, do you think most effectively protect everyday users?
Interview3_ZH: 在你组织或参与的社区活动中，哪一种形式最能让新人真正理解链上交易风险？如果要把这种形式在线上全球复制，你会怎么做？
Interview3_EN: Among the community activities you’ve organized or joined, which format best helps newcomers truly understand on‑chain risk, and how would you scale that format globally in an online setting?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Adrian Zduńczyk（CMT）是一位成功的波兰企业家和行业领袖，也是波兰唯一的特许市场技术分析师（Chartered Market Technician®）。他是加密货币专家，创立并担任 THE ₿IRB NEST® 首席执行官，这是一家正加速成长、立志成为全球区块链咨询公司的初创企业。Adrian 在行业内备受尊敬，在 Twitter／X 上拥有超过 72 万粉丝，拥有化学工艺技术工程硕士以及金融管理硕士学位，同时也是演讲者、导师与意见领袖。他相信财务自由应该向世界各地所有人开放，并以可靠顾问服务、专业咨询和认证分析为企业赋能，同时为个人提供工具与教育，帮助其实现财务自由；无论面对全球投资者、创业者还是新手交易员，他都努力在每一次分享中带来清晰、真诚与变革性的洞见。
Biography_EN: Adrian Zduńczyk, CMT, is a successful Polish entrepreneur and leader. The only Chartered Market Technician® from Poland. Cryptocurrency specialist. Founder and CEO of THE ₿IRB NEST® – a dynamic startup scaling up to become a worldwide blockchain consulting company. Respected in the industry, with over 720,000 Twitter/X followers. Chemical Technology Master of Engineering and Master of Management in Finance. Performer. Mentor. Influencer. He believes financial freedom should be accessible for everybody, everywhere. He's on a mission to empower businesses with reliable advisory, professional consulting, and certified analysis while inspiring individuals with tools and education for financial freedom. Whether addressing global investors, founders, or aspiring traders, Adrian brings clarity, authenticity, and transformative insight to every stage.
Interview1_ZH: Adrian Zdunczyk，您在THE ₿IRB NEST®担任Founder, CMT & Market Visionary期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder, CMT & Market Visionary at THE ₿IRB NEST®, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你以 CMT 身份做技术分析多年，也经历了多轮牛熊。你现在最常提醒学员的一条“反直觉”交易原则是什么？为什么大部分人做不到？
Interview2_EN: As a CMT and long‑time market technician, you’ve lived through many cycles. What is the most counter‑intuitive trading rule you keep repeating to your students, and why is it so hard for most people to follow?
Interview3_ZH: THE ₿IRB NEST 从内容社群走向咨询业务，在这个过程中，你如何平衡“付费信号”的商业化与“教育内容”的长期信誉？
Interview3_EN: THE ₿IRB NEST has grown from a content community into a consulting business. How do you personally balance monetizing “signals” with preserving the long‑term credibility of your educational content?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Alexia Hilbertidou 是 GirlBoss New Zealand 和 GirlBoss UAE 的创始人，这一拥有 17,500 名成员的社群正在重新定义新西兰、太平洋和中东地区的女性领导力。她的使命很简单：让更多女性走进决策桌，并为新一代女性提供信心、数字素养和面向未来的技能。Alexia 在 16 岁时就在卧室里创立了 GirlBoss，如今这一运动已触达 27 个国家的年轻女性。她已在 150 多所国际学校演讲，激励超过 10 万名学生释放自身潜能；通过 GirlBoss Edge 加速器，已孵化超过 5,000 个青年主导的社会影响力项目，体现她“你从不嫌太年轻去改变世界”的核心信念。她的全球平台将她带到了纽约联合国和瑞士世界经济论坛，并与 Richard Branson 爵士和 Meghan Markle 等领袖同台演讲。在迪拜，她被任命为 2020 年世博会性别平等大使，并联合阿联酋青年部长 Shamma Al Mazrui 阁下举办旗舰青年赋能活动 ChangemakeHer，影响逾 600 名学生，被赞誉为推动该地区青年领导力变革的重要力量。她获得了 30 多项国际荣誉，包括《福布斯》“30 Under 30”和“世界年度青年企业家”决赛入围，是国家地理探险家，并曾担任美国航天局 NASA 的 VIP 科学传播者，目前主持一部将于 2025 年底在 Disney+ 上线的纪录片。年仅 19 岁时，她就加入一家管理 48 亿美元慈善投资基金的董事会，成为全球同类机构中最年轻的董事之一。Alexia 还因对英联邦的贡献而获颁女王青年领袖奖，在白金汉宫由英国女王亲自授勋，是史上最年轻的获奖英联邦公民。她拥有新兴技术硕士学位，并在剑桥大学学习“变革型领导力”。
Biography_EN: Alexia Hilbertidou is the founder of GirlBoss New Zealand and GirlBoss UAE — a 17,500-strong movement of ambitious young women redefining leadership across New Zealand, the Pacific, and the Middle East.Her mission is simple: get more women to the table and equip the next generation with the confidence, digital fluency, and future-ready skills they need to lead. Alexia founded GirlBoss at just 16 years old from her bedroom. Today, the movement has reached young women across 27 countries. She has spoken at over 150 international schools, empowering more than 100,000 students to step into their potential. Through the GirlBoss Edge accelerator, over 5,000 youth-led social impact projects have been launched, bringing to life Alexia’s core message: you’re never too young to create change.Her global platform has taken her to the United Nations in New York and the World Economic Forum in Switzerland, where she has shared stages with leaders such as Sir Richard Branson and Meghan Markle.In Dubai, Alexia was appointed the Gender Equality Ambassador at World Expo 2020. She led ChangemakeHer, a flagship youth empowerment event co-hosted with Her Excellency Shamma Al Mazrui, UAE Minister of Youth, reaching over 600 students and earning praise for transforming youth leadership in the region.Her impact has been recognised with more than 30 international honours, including Forbes 30 Under 30 and Finalist for World Young Entrepreneur of the Year. A National Geographic Explorer and former VIP Scientific Communicator for NASA, Alexia is the host of an upcoming Disney+ documentary premiering in late 2025. At just 19, she joined the board of a 4.8 billion USD philanthropic investment fund, making her one of the youngest directors of its kind worldwide.Alexia was also awarded a Queen's Young Leader Award for Services to the Commonwealth by Her Majesty, The Queen, at Buckingham Palace. She was selected from over 20,000 nominations and is the youngest Commonwealth Citizen to hold this honour.She holds a Master’s in Emerging Technology and studied Leadership for Change at the University of Cambridge.
Interview1_ZH: Alexia Hilbertidou，您在GirlBoss & Changemakeher担任Founder & CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder & CEO at GirlBoss & Changemakeher, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在十几岁就创立 GirlBoss，并跨越新西兰、太平洋和中东运营社群。你观察到 Z 世代女孩在谈论 Web3、AI 和创业时，最不一样的一点是什么？
Interview2_EN: You founded GirlBoss as a teenager and now operate communities across New Zealand, the Pacific and the Middle East. What is the most striking difference you see in how Gen Z girls talk about Web3, AI, and entrepreneurship compared to earlier generations?
Interview3_ZH: GirlBoss Edge 已经孵化了上千个青年项目，如果让你专门为“Web3 女创始人”设计一个新批次，你会给她们设置什么样的挑战任务来测试执行力和同理心？
Interview3_EN: GirlBoss Edge has incubated thousands of youth projects. If you were to design a special batch just for “Web3 female founders,” what kind of challenge would you set to test both their execution and empathy?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Alexandre Dreyfus 是一位拥有近 30 年经验的资深数字企业家，在游戏、体育和娱乐行业中不断打造新业务。他被视为将科技应用于粉丝互动领域的前瞻性人物，多次受邀在 Web Summit、TOKEN2049、Consensus 和卡塔尔经济论坛等全球顶级会议上分享见解。
Biography_EN: Alexandre Dreyfus is a seasoned digital entrepreneur with almost 30 years of experience in developing business projects within the gaming, sports, and entertainment industries. Considered a visionary in applying tech to fan engagement, he has been invited to share his views at the world’s most influential conferences, including Web Summit, Token2049, Consensus and the Qatar Economic Forum.
Interview1_ZH: Alex Dreyfus，您在Chiliz担任Founder & CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder & CEO at Chiliz, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在体育和娱乐 IP 上做了大量粉丝经济实验。回顾这几年，你觉得粉丝真正愿意为之付费的“链上权益”，和最初想象有什么差别？
Interview2_EN: You’ve run many fan‑engagement experiments across sports and entertainment IP. Looking back, how do the on‑chain rights that fans are truly willing to pay for differ from what you initially imagined?
Interview3_ZH: 很多俱乐部与联盟都想“发币、做平台”，但大部分项目都难以持续。以你的经验，如果他们只能做一件事来证明长期价值，你会建议从哪一步开始？
Interview3_EN: Many clubs and leagues want to “launch tokens and build platforms,” yet most projects struggle to sustain. From your experience, if they could do just one thing to prove long‑term value, what would you advise them to start with?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Alice Liu 是 CoinMarketCap 研究负责人，CoinMarketCap 是全球最大的加密货币数据平台，也是数以百万计用户进入加密世界的入口。自 2022 年加入以来，她构建了 CMC 的研究体系，利用平台专有数据、社区信号、市场分析和行业合作，为加密市场提供深度洞察。
Biography_EN: Alice Liu is the Head of Research at CoinMarketCap, the world’s largest crypto data platform and the gateway for millions of users worldwide. Since joining in 2022, she has built CMC’s research presents—leveraging proprietary data, community signals, market analysis and industry collaborations to deliver deep insights into the crypto market.
Interview1_ZH: Alice Liu，您在CoinMarketCap担任Head of Research期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Head of Research at CoinMarketCap, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 CoinMarketCap 负责研究，拥有大量链上与流量数据。你如何避免“被数据带节奏”，而是用数据帮助团队拆穿短期泡沫与虚假叙事？
Interview2_EN: As Head of Research at CoinMarketCap, you sit on top of vast on‑chain and traffic data. How do you avoid being “dragged by the data narrative” and instead use data to puncture short‑term bubbles and misleading stories?
Interview3_ZH: 过去两年，很多新用户把 CMC 当成进入加密世界的“首页”。如果要在这个入口增加一条“新手必须看到的一句话提示”，你会写什么？
Interview3_EN: Over the past two years many newcomers treat CMC as the “homepage” of crypto. If you could add a single mandatory sentence that every new user must see, what would it say?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Amrit Kumar 博士是 AltLayer 的首席运营官，曾任 Zilliqa Research 的联合创始人、总裁兼首席科学官。他曾在新加坡国立大学从事研究工作，并于法国 Inria 获得计算机科学博士学位，在 PLDI、OOPSLA、ESORICS 和 DSN 等顶级会议上发表多篇关于区块链和智能合约的学术论文，其中许多成果已被应用于实际生产系统。
Biography_EN: Dr. Amrit Kumar is the COO of AltLayer. He was formerly Co-Founder, President and Chief Science Officer of Zilliqa Research. He researched at the National University of Singapore and has a PhD in Computer Science from Inria, France. He has published several academic papers on blockchains and smart contracts at top tier conferences such as PLDI, OOPSLA, ESORICS and DSN. Many of his research papers have been deployed into production systems.
Interview1_ZH: Amrit Kumar，您在AltLayer担任COO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the COO at AltLayer, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Zilliqa 和 AltLayer 都深度参与公链和模块化基础设施研发。站在今天，你认为“扩容”这个词本身已经过时了吗？如果要换一个词来描述未来的区块链架构，你会选什么？
Interview2_EN: You’ve worked deeply on base layers and modular infrastructure at Zilliqa and AltLayer. From today’s perspective, do you think the word “scalability” itself is outdated, and if you had to choose a new term to describe future blockchain architectures, what would it be?
Interview3_ZH: 你的多篇论文已经被直接落地到生产系统。作为研究者和创业者，你在做技术决策时，如何处理“学术上最优解”和“工程上可落地解”之间的冲突？
Interview3_EN: Many of your research papers have been deployed into production systems. As both a researcher and founder, how do you handle conflicts between the academically optimal design and what is actually shippable in engineering?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Andrei Grachev 是 DWF Labs 的管理合伙人。作为行业思想领袖，他曾在 TOKEN2049 和 Consensus 等大会发表演讲，并多次被 Cointelegraph、Investing.com 等媒体报道。
Biography_EN: Andrei Grachev is the Managing Partner of DWF Labs. As a thought leader, Andrei has spoken at TOKEN2049 and Consensus, and has been featured in media outlets such as Cointelegraph and Investing.com.
Interview1_ZH: Andrei Grachev，您在DWF Labs担任Managing Partner期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Managing Partner at DWF Labs, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 作为 DWF Labs 的管理合伙人，你在二级市场与早期投资之间都非常活跃。2024–2025 年你在市场中看到的最大“流动性错配”是什么？你们是如何捕捉这类机会的？
Interview2_EN: As Managing Partner at DWF Labs, you are active in both secondary markets and early‑stage deals. What is the biggest “liquidity mismatch” you’ve observed in 2024–2025, and how do you design strategies to capture those opportunities?
Interview3_ZH: 你经常在 TOKEN2049 和 Consensus 分享观点。相较于会场上的公开演讲，你在私下和项目方谈判时，最常提醒他们的一条风险是什么？
Interview3_EN: You frequently speak at TOKEN2049 and Consensus. Compared with what you say on stage, what is the one risk you most often warn founders about in private deal discussions?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Avery 是 Aptos Labs 的首席执行官兼联合创始人，该团队推动了 Aptos 一层区块链的推出。Avery 在 Meta 任职超过十年，曾担任加密平台技术负责人，负责通用区块链开发与生态系统、钱包基础设施、战略以及最重要的 Diem 区块链项目。在此之前，他还是 Meta 所有批处理团队的总体技术负责人，统筹 Spark、图计算（Apache Giraph）、Facebook Hive／Hadoop（Corona）、分布式调度和统一数据管道编程模型等系统，这些技术为 Meta 全系产品提供分析支撑，并在数十万台机器规模上运行。Avery 出生并成长于夏威夷檀香山，本科和博士均就读于西北大学计算机工程专业，博士研究方向为超级计算、并行计算框架和高性能文件系统。
Biography_EN: Avery is the CEO and Co-Founder of Aptos Labs, the team that helped to launch the Aptos layer 1 blockchain. Avery spent over a decade leading teams at Meta, most recently as the Tech Lead of the crypto platform, which covered projects across general blockchain development and ecosystems, wallet infrastructure, strategy and most notably the Diem blockchain. Prior to that, Avery was the overall tech lead of all of Meta’s batch processing teams including Spark, Graph processing (Apache Giraph), Facebook Hive/Hadoop (Corona), distributed scheduling, and the unified programming model for pipelines. These technologies power analytics for all of Meta’s products and scale to hundreds of thousands of machines. Born and raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, Avery studied computer engineering at Northwestern University where he also received his PhD in Computer Engineering specializing in the area of supercomputing, parallel computing frameworks, and high-performance file systems.
Interview1_ZH: Avery Ching，您在Aptos Labs担任Co-Founder & CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder & CEO at Aptos Labs, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Meta 负责过批处理、图计算和 Diem 区块链，如今又在 Aptos 带领一条新公链。你如何判断一项复杂底层技术什么时候应该“藏在基础设施里”，而不是暴露给开发者和用户？
Interview2_EN: You led batch processing, graph systems, and the Diem blockchain at Meta and now build a new Layer‑1 at Aptos. How do you decide when a complex piece of technology should be “hidden in the infrastructure” rather than exposed directly to developers and users?
Interview3_ZH: 你从超级计算到高性能文件系统再到公链，在分布式系统领域已经工作多年。如果让你用一个类比，向完全非技术背景的监管者解释“为什么高性能公链不等于高风险赌场”，你会怎么说？
Interview3_EN: From supercomputing to high‑performance file systems and blockchains, you’ve worked in distributed systems for years. Using a single analogy, how would you explain to a non‑technical regulator why a high‑performance blockchain does not automatically mean a high‑risk casino?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Title_ZH: Author of the Network State. Founder of the Network School.
Title_EN: Author of the Network State. Founder of the Network School.
Biography_ZH: Balaji S. Srinivasan（@balajis）是《Network State》一书以及 Network School 的创始人。曾任 Coinbase 首席技术官和 Andreessen Horowitz 普通合伙人，是众多成功科技公司的早期投资人，包括 Alchemy、Anduril、Benchling、Celestia、CoinTracker、Culdesac、Dapper Labs、Digital Ocean、Enhanced Games、Espresso Systems、Farcaster、Hadrian、Infinita、Instadapp、Luma、Minicircle、Mirror、Nucleus Genomics、Omada Health、OpenGov、OpenSea、Orchid Health、Paradigm、Perplexity、Polychain、Polymarket、Prospera、Replit、Republic、Starkware、Stedi、Superhuman、Synthesis、Varda、VoteAgora 和 Zora 等。作为 Coinbase 的首席技术官，他主导了 USDC 的发行，也是多项重要加密协议的早期投资人，包括 Bitcoin 、Ethereum 、Solana 、Avalanche 、Chainlink 、NEAR 、Polygon 、XMTP 和 Zcash 。Srinivasan 还是 Earn.com（后被 Coinbase 收购）、Counsyl（被 Myriad 收购）、Teleport（被 Topia 收购）以及 Coin Center 的联合创始人，拥有斯坦福大学电气工程学士、硕士、博士学位以及化学工程硕士学位。
Biography_EN: Balaji S. Srinivasan (@balajis) is the author of the Network State and founder of the Network School. Formerly the CTO of Coinbase and General Partner at Andreessen Horowitz, he is an early investor in many successful tech companies, including Alchemy, Anduril, Benchling, Celestia, CoinTracker, Culdesac, Dapper Labs, Digital Ocean, Enhanced Games, Espresso Systems, Farcaster, Hadrian, Infinita, Instadapp, Luma, Minicircle, Mirror, Nucleus Genomics, Omada Health, OpenGov, OpenSea, Orchid Health, Paradigm, Perplexity, Polychain, Polymarket, Prospera, Replit, Republic, Starkware, Stedi, Superhuman, Synthesis, Varda, VoteAgora, and Zora, to name a few. Balaji also led the launch of USDC as Coinbase CTO, and was an early investor in many important crypto protocols including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, Avalanche, Chainlink, NEAR, Polygon, XMTP, and Zcash. Dr. Srinivasan was the cofounder of Earn.com (acquired by Coinbase), Counsyl (acquired by Myriad), Teleport (acquired by Topia), and Coin Center. He holds a BS/MS/PhD in Electrical Engineering and an MS in Chemical Engineering from Stanford University.
Interview1_ZH: Balaji Srinivasan，您在贵团队担任Author of the Network State. Founder of the Network School.期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Author of the Network State. Founder of the Network School. at your team, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在《Network State》中提出用网络社区重塑国家与制度，如果把这个框架应用到当下的加密行业，你认为最先会被“网络国家化”的会是哪些具体行业或城市？
Interview2_EN: In “The Network State,” you propose rebuilding institutions around networked communities. If you apply that framework to today’s crypto industry, which specific sectors or cities do you expect to be “network‑state‑ified” first, and why?
Interview3_ZH: 你过去几年一直在写作、投资和教育，帮助更多人理解 Web3。对于已经在加密行业工作的人来说，你觉得他们最容易忽视、但又决定未来 5–10 年成败的一条思维升级是什么？
Interview3_EN: Over the last few years you’ve focused on writing, investing, and educating around Web3. For people already working in crypto, what is the single mindset upgrade they most often overlook, yet will determine their success or failure over the next 5–10 years?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Title_ZH: Managing Editor & Anchor of Connect the World, Abu Dhabi
Title_EN: Managing Editor & Anchor of Connect the World, Abu Dhabi
Biography_ZH: 她常驻 CNN 阿布扎比分部，是《Connect the World with Becky Anderson》节目的主持人兼总编辑。她从海湾地区视角，为 CNN 全球观众解读海湾地区新兴政治经济趋势、塑造该地区的关键地缘政治竞争以及该地区在全球事务中日益重要的角色。Anderson 擅长深度访谈，曾与世界各地的政界领袖、决策者、思想家与文化名人对话，其中包括土耳其总统埃尔多安、巴基斯坦前总理伊姆兰·汗、约旦王后拉尼娅、阿联酋人工智能部长 Omar Al Olama、阿联酋气候变化与环境部长 Mariam Almheiri、联合国秘书长安东尼奥·古特雷斯、卡塔尔首相兼外长 Mohammed Al Thani，以及体育明星马拉多纳、伊布拉希莫维奇、奥尼尔、萨拉赫和姆巴佩等，还有演员 Golshifteh Farahani 和歌手 Alicia Keys。
Biography_EN: Based at CNN's Abu Dhabi bureau, she hosts Connect the World with Becky Anderson and serves as Managing Editor. She provides CNN’s global audience with a regional perspective on the emerging politico-economic trends in the Gulf, the key geo-political rivalries shaping the region, and the increasingly inﬂuential role it plays in global aﬀairs. Anderson is a skilled interviewer, adept at close questioning, she has interviewed many of the world's leading politicians, decision-makers, thought-leaders and cultural icons. Among these are many high proﬁle ﬁgures, including: Turkey’s president, Recep Tayyip Erdogan; former Prime Minister of Pakistan, Imran Khan; Queen Rania of Jordan; the UAE Minister of Artiﬁcial Intelligence, Omar Al Olama; UAE Minister for Climate Change and Environment Mariam Almheiri; UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres; the Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Aﬀairs of Qatar, Mohammed Al Thani; sports stars Diego Maradona, Zlatan Ibrahimovic, Shaquille O'Neal, Mohammed Salah, and Kylian Mbappe, actress Golshifteh Farahani, and singer Alicia Keys.
Interview1_ZH: Becky Anderson，您在CNN担任Managing Editor & Anchor of Connect the World, Abu Dhabi期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Managing Editor & Anchor of Connect the World, Abu Dhabi at CNN, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你长期从阿布扎比报道全球政治经济热点，如果让你用一个海湾地区的真实故事，来形容“普通人如何感受到数字资产和新金融基础设施的变化”，你会选哪一个？
Interview2_EN: Reporting from Abu Dhabi, you’ve seen how global shifts play out in the Gulf. If you had to use one real story from the region to illustrate how everyday people are actually feeling the impact of digital assets and new financial infrastructure, which story would you choose?
Interview3_ZH: 从传统地缘政治到 Web3，你在采访中最明显感受到的一点变化是什么？是嘉宾的关注点、媒体的提问方式，还是观众对“信任”的定义？
Interview3_EN: From classic geopolitics to Web3 and digital finance, what is the most striking change you’ve felt in your interviews: is it what guests care about, how media frames questions, or how audiences define “trust”?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Ben 于 2019 年创立 “Into the Cryptoverse”，旨在为金融市场提供客观中立的视角。他拥有数学学士和核工程博士学位，因此能以独特的视角分析加密世界。Ben 的目标是利用自己的专业知识和经验，帮助他人更高效地在金融市场中航行；通过对股票、加密货币和宏观经济的评论，他致力于帮助受众建立对整体市场格局的全面理解。
Biography_EN: Ben founded “Into the Cryptoverse” in 2019 to offer an impartial outlook on financial markets. His B.S. in mathematics and PhD in nuclear engineering allows him to bring a unique perspective to the cryptoverse.Ben’s objective is to leverage his expertise and experience to assist others in effectively navigating financial markets. Through his commentary on equities, crypto, and macroeconomics, he strives to empower others to develop a well-rounded understanding of the overall market landscape.
Interview1_ZH: Benjamin Cowen，您在Into The Cryptoverse担任Founder & CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder & CEO at Into The Cryptoverse, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你的视频中常用数据和模型解释周期。回顾最近一轮牛熊，你发现哪一个你自己之前也低估了的重要指标？这次经历如何改变了你对“数据 vs 直觉”的权重？
Interview2_EN: You regularly use data and models to explain market cycles. Looking back at the latest bull–bear cycle, which important indicator did even you underestimate, and how has that experience changed the weight you give to “data versus intuition”?
Interview3_ZH: 面向刚入场的散户，你会如何建议他们在日常投资决策中“最小化指标数量”？如果只能保留三类数据，你会选哪三类？
Interview3_EN: For newcomers, how would you advise them to “minimize the number of indicators” they use day to day, and if they could only keep three types of data in their toolkit, which three would you choose?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Ben Weiss 是《Fortune》杂志驻纽约的加密货币记者，此前在迪拜为 DL News 撰稿。他还曾为《Harper’s Magazine》做事实核查，并向《WIRED》《The Verge》《The Guardian》《Slate》《Gizmodo》《Business Insider》和 PBS《NewsHour》等媒体投稿。他在纽约大学获得了新闻学与国际关系双硕士学位。
Biography_EN: Ben Weiss reports on crypto for Fortune in New York. Previously, he wrote for DL News from Dubai. He's also fact-checked for Harper's Magazine and contributed to WIRED, The Verge, the Guardian, Slate, Gizmodo, Business Insider, and PBS NewsHour. He has a joint master's degree from New York University in journalism and international relations.
Interview1_ZH: Ben Weiss，您在Fortune担任Reporter期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Reporter at Fortune, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你从迪拜转到纽约报道加密，亲历了不同监管与舆论环境。对你来说，哪一个地区的监管故事最能体现“公众如何被说服或被吓退”？
Interview2_EN: You’ve reported on crypto from Dubai and now New York, across very different regulatory and media climates. Which region’s regulatory story best illustrates how the public can either be convinced or scared away by the narrative?
Interview3_ZH: 过去几年你采访了很多项目和监管者，如果要给想进入 Web3 的年轻记者三条职业建议，你会更强调哪一方面：技术理解、金融素养还是讲故事的能力？
Interview3_EN: You’ve interviewed many builders and regulators. For young journalists entering Web3, which three capabilities would you emphasize most: technical literacy, financial literacy, or storytelling—and how would you rank them?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Bilal Bin Saqib 自 2016 年起便是早期比特币持有者，也是该领域活跃的天使投资人，目前担任巴基斯坦加密与区块链部长、总理特别顾问以及巴基斯坦虚拟资产监管局主席。他拥有伦敦政治经济学院硕士学位，对人工智能、量子技术和机器人技术有浓厚兴趣，致力于将新兴技术融入巴基斯坦的发展故事。他入选《福布斯》“30 Under 30”，并被查尔斯三世国王授予 MBE 勋衔，将政策、科技与使命感融为一体。
Biography_EN: Bilal Bin Saqib - early Bitcoiner since 2016 and active angel investor in the space — is Pakistan’s Minister for Crypto & Blockchain, Special Advisor to the Prime Minister, and Chairman of the Pakistan Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority. He holds a master’s degree from the London School of Economics, has a keen interest in AI, quantum, and robotics, and is committed to channeling emerging technologies into Pakistan’s growth story. Recognized by Forbes 30 Under 30 and honored as an MBE by King Charles III, Bilal blends policy, technology, and purpose.
Interview1_ZH: Bilal Bin Saqib，您在Pakistan Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority担任Chairman期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Chairman at Pakistan Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你既是政策制定者，也是早期比特币投资人。站在 2025 年，你如何在推动创新与保护弱势群体之间划出一条“巴基斯坦版”的监管红线？
Interview2_EN: You are both a policymaker and an early Bitcoiner. From your 2025 vantage point, how do you draw a distinctly “Pakistani” regulatory red line between fostering innovation and protecting vulnerable users?
Interview3_ZH: 你常提到用新技术讲好“巴基斯坦增长故事”。如果只能通过一个区块链项目向世界展示巴基斯坦的潜力，你会优先选择哪一类应用场景？
Interview3_EN: You often talk about using emerging tech to tell Pakistan’s growth story. If you could showcase your country’s potential through just one blockchain project, which use case would you prioritize?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Bill Qian 是 Cypher Capital 的联合创始人，这是一家拥有逾 140 个投资组合、领先的多策略数字资产投资机构。此前，他担任中东首家上市、由主权机构支持的加密公司 Phoenix Group 的首席投资官；再之前，他曾任全球最大加密平台 Binance 的全球投资负责人，并出任 TON Foundation 的董事会成员，TON 是由 Telegram 生态发展而来的区块链项目，拥有逾 10 亿月活用户。Bill 还主持播客节目 “Bill It Up”，在多个平台拥有超过 30 万订阅者，是亚洲和中东地区最具影响力的科技播客之一。
Biography_EN: Bill Qian is the co-founder of Cypher Capital, a leading multi-strategy digital asset firm with more than 140 portfolios. Previously, he served as CIO of Phoenix Group, the first listed crypto company in the Middle East backed by a sovereign entity. Before that, Bill was Global Head of Investments at Binance, the world's largest crypto platform. He also served as a Board Member of TON Foundation, the blockchain project under Telegram, which has over one billion monthly active users.Bill also hosts Bill It Up—a global podcast with over 300,000 subscribers across multiple platforms. The show is one of the most influential tech podcasts in Asia and the Middle East.
Interview1_ZH: Bill Qian，您在Cypher Capital担任Co-Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder at Cypher Capital, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你从 Binance 投资部门到 Phoenix、Cypher Capital，一直在管理多策略加密投资组合。现在你筛选早期项目时，最早会问创始人哪三个问题？
Interview2_EN: From Binance’s investment arm to Phoenix and Cypher Capital, you’ve overseen multi‑strategy crypto portfolios. When you screen early‑stage deals today, what are the first three questions you ask founders?
Interview3_ZH: 你在中东和亚洲都深度布局。如果比较这两个地区的 Web3 创业环境，你认为哪一个“隐形优势”最容易被海外投资人忽视？
Interview3_EN: You’ve built deep networks in both the Middle East and Asia. Comparing these regions’ Web3 ecosystems, what is one “hidden advantage” in each that global investors most often overlook?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Bonnie Chang 是 “Bonnie Blockchain” 的创作者，这是观看量最高的华语加密与财经 YouTube 频道之一。她以深入浅出的访谈见长，对话比特币、区块链和宏观经济领域的全球领袖，用清晰易懂的方式向观众传递复杂观点。
Biography_EN: Bonnie Chang is the creator of Bonnie Blockchain, the most-watched Chinese-language crypto and finance YouTube channel. Known for interviewing global leaders across Bitcoin, blockchain, and macroeconomics, she brings complex ideas to audiences in a clear and accessible way.
Interview1_ZH: Bonnie Chang，您在Bonnie Blockchain担任YouTuber期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？

Biography_ZH: Crypto Warehouse 是一对内容创作者与直播搭档，提供每天深入的加密货币市场报道。该频道 7 天无休，在 Binance Live、YouTube 和 X 等多个平台同步直播，比特币与山寨币的实时分析、宏观经济洞察、突发新闻解读以及互动问答（AMA）。
Biography_EN: Crypto Warehouse is a duo of content creators and live-streamers delivering daily in-depth coverage of cryptocurrency markets. The channel provides real-time Bitcoin and altcoin analysis, macro-economic insights, breaking news commentary, and interactive AMAs, broadcasting seven days a week across multiple platforms, namely Binance Live, YouTube and X.
Interview1_ZH: Brogan ​，您在Crypto Warehouse担任Content Creator期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Content Creator at Crypto Warehouse, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在教育和社群运营方面都有经验。你观察到，新一代投资者在进入加密世界时，最容易被哪种“成功故事”误导？
Interview2_EN: With experience in education and community building, what kind of “success story” do you see misleading the new wave of crypto investors the most?
Interview3_ZH: 如果你可以为 Web3 新人写一份“第一年路线图”，你会在其中安排哪一个非加密的学习模块，来帮助他们保持理性？

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Bruce 是投资控股公司 Chainstone Labs 的首席执行官。自 2013 年起，他便全职投身比特币领域，当时曾担任 Bitcoin Foundation 的执行董事。他在金融与投资领域拥有超过 30 年经验，同时拥有注册投资顾问公司 Atlantic Financial。Fenton 是自由主义与自由市场的积极倡导者，并于 2022 年竞选美国新罕布什尔州联邦参议员。他还是 Satoshi Roundtable 的主办人，这一活动已举办至第 12 届，每年汇聚金融科技和比特币生态中的顶级创始人、首席执行官和开发者。
Biography_EN: Bruce is CEO of the investment holding company Chainstone Labs. Bruce has been full time in Bitcoin since 2013 when he was Executive Director of the Bitcoin Foundation. He has over 30 years financial and investing experience and owns Atlantic Financial, a Registered Investment Advisor. Fenton is a liberty and free market advocate and ran for US Senate for New Hampshire in 2022. Fenton is the host of the Satoshi Roundtable, now in its 12th year, an annual event bringing together leading Founders, CEOs, and developers in the fintech and Bitcoin ecosystem.
Interview1_ZH: Bruce Fenton，您在Chainstone Labs担任CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CEO at Chainstone Labs, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你既是传统金融老兵，又是早期比特币倡导者。经历 2013 以来的监管与市场波折，你对“比特币与自由市场”的看法有哪些被现实修正了？
Interview2_EN: You are both a TradFi veteran and early Bitcoin advocate. After living through all the cycles and regulatory waves since 2013, in what ways have your views on “Bitcoin and free markets” been revised by reality?
Interview3_ZH: 你组织 Satoshi Roundtable 已经很多年，如果把这些闭门讨论提炼成一条给政策制定者的建议，那条建议会是什么？
Interview3_EN: You’ve hosted the Satoshi Roundtable for many years. If you had to distill all those off‑the‑record conversations into one piece of advice for policymakers, what would it be?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Catherine 是 Binance 的 VIP 与机构业务负责人，负责为从高净值个人、 中型自营团队到全球金融机构等最复杂客户群体提供全球化服务。在加入 Binance 之前，她在摩根士丹利和摩根大通等大型投行从事传统金融工作长达 15 年，专注于结构性衍生品及相关解决方案。Catherine 拥有 Kellogg–HKUST 高级工商管理硕士学位，并在台湾大学取得经济学和国际关系双学士学位。
Biography_EN: Catherine is Head of VIP & Institutional at Binance, where she oversees global coverage of the exchange’s most sophisticated clients, ranging from individual traders and mid-sized proprietary teams to global financial institutions. Prior to joining Binance, Catherine spent 15 years in traditional finance across bulge brackets including Morgan Stanley and JP Morgan, specializing in structured derivatives and derivatives solutions.  Catherine holds an Executive MBA from Kellogg-HKUST as well as dual BA degrees in Economics and International Relations from National Taiwan University.
Interview1_ZH: Catherine Chen，您在Binance担任Head of VIP & Institutional期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Head of VIP & Institutional at Binance, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你负责币安 VIP 与机构业务，对不同类型专业客户的需求非常敏感。最近一年里，你觉得机构客户提出的“新问题”里，哪一个最能代表他们对加密资产认知的升级？
Interview2_EN: As Head of VIP & Institutional at Binance, you’re close to a wide range of sophisticated clients. Over the past year, which “new question” from institutions best reflects how their understanding of digital assets has evolved?
Interview3_ZH: 你在结构性衍生品方面有多年经验，如果要把这些复杂工具翻译成服务 Web3 用户的创新产品，你最期待看到哪一种“混合型”结构先落地？
Interview3_EN: With your background in structured derivatives, if you were to translate those complex tools into products for Web3, what kind of “hybrid” structure would you most like to see launched first?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Charles 是 Capriole Investments、Capriole Fund、Capriole Charts 和 REF 的创始人，拥有超过 20 年投资经验和 10 年量化交易算法编写经验。他是著名链上模型 “Hash Ribbons” 和 “Macro Index” 的创作者，并利用 200 多个宏观与加密数据因子构建专有投资模型，是全球领先的比特币链上和宏观模型发布者之一，其指标位列 TradingView 前十，并已在 Glassnode、CryptoQuant 等平台上线。他创建了 100 多个开源指标，撰写了十余篇研究报告，并定期向在 X 上超过 12 万粉丝分享市场洞察。Charles 曾被包括 CNBC、《Forbes》《Bloomberg》和《Bitcoin Magazine》在内的媒体报道 200 余次，参与 20 多档播客节目（其中包括 2021 年的 “We Study Billionaires”），并在 2025 年 TOKEN2049 等大型会议上演讲，其演讲曾被《Forbes》评为大会首要趋势。创立 Capriole 之前，他在埃森哲（前身 GRA）担任经理，为丰田和澳大利亚国防军等客户交付累计逾 5,000 万美元成本节约，期间开发了用于优化数百万种库存项目需求与供应计划的系统化模型。他曾在澳大利亚、伦敦和丹麦学习，多次获得院长嘉奖和奖学金。
Biography_EN: Founder of Capriole Investments, the Capriole Fund, Capriole Charts and REF. Charles has been investing for over 20 years and coding trading algorithms for a decade. He is the creator of renowned on-chain models like “Hash Ribbons” and “Macro Index” and has built proprietary investment models using over 200 macro and crypto data signals. He is one of the leading publishers of on-chain Bitcoin and macro models globally, with his indicators and models featured in the top 10 on TradingView, and also available on Glassnode, CryptoQuant and more. He has created 100+ open-source metrics, authored 10+ research pieces, and regularly shares market insights with his 120,000+ followers on X (X.com/@Caprioleio). Charles has been featured in 200+ media articles (including CNBC, Forbes, Bloomberg and Bitcoin Magazine), has appeared on 20+ podcasts (including “We Study Billionaires” in 2021, the world’s largest stock investing podcast) and spoken at major conferences such as TOKEN2049 in 2025 (the world’s largest crypto conference) where Forbes recognized his speech as the number 1 trend for the event. Before Capriole, Charles was a Manager at Accenture (prev. GRA), delivering $50M+ in savings for clients like Toyota and the Australian Defence Force, where he developed systematic models for optimising the demand and supply planning for dollars of inventory covering millions of stock items. He holds two Dean’s Awards and three scholarships from studies in Australia, London, and Denmark.
Interview1_ZH: Charles Edwards，您在Capriole Investments担任Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder at Capriole Investments, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你的多款链上与宏观模型被广泛引用。回顾过去几年，有没有某个你自己模型发出的信号与你主观感觉相反，但最终被事实证明是对的？
Interview2_EN: Many of your on‑chain and macro models are widely used. In recent years, was there a moment when your model’s signal contradicted your gut feeling but turned out to be right?
Interview3_ZH: 作为长期构建量化系统的投资人，你如何建议个人投资者在不写一行代码的情况下，把“系统化思维”引入自己的投资流程？
Interview3_EN: As a systematic investor, how would you recommend that retail investors introduce “systematic thinking” into their process without writing a single line of code?

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: 暂无中文介绍（可在 CSV 中补充）
Interview1_ZH: Christian Rau，您在Mastercard担任SVP Digital Assets and Blockchain期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the SVP Digital Assets and Blockchain at Mastercard, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你长期在支付与卡组织体系中推动创新。相较几年前，你现在对稳定币和链上结算的态度最大变化是什么？
Interview2_EN: You’ve spent years driving innovation in card and payments networks. Compared to a few years ago, what has changed most in your view of stablecoins and on‑chain settlement?

Biography_ZH: 一位拥有超过 8 年市场经验的加密技术分析与基本面分析专家，专注于一目均衡云、价格行为和趋势结构。他最初在币安开启交易之路，如今通过成熟的分析方法和每日更新，帮助全球交易者在加密市场中导航。他的内容包含透明的图表拆解、教育式讲解、经实战检验的交易方案，以及结合技术与基本面的长期洞察，目标是为交易者提供实用知识、稳定策略，并通过以学习为核心的社区驱动方式共同成长。

He began his journey with Binance and now helps traders worldwide navigate the crypto market through proven analysis and daily updates. His content features transparent chart breakdowns, educational explanations, battle‑tested setups, and long‑term insights across both technical and fundamental analysis. His goal is to equip traders with practical knowledge, consistent strategies, and a community‑driven approach that keeps learning at the center.

Biography_ZH: Dani Topala 是 ICN Media 的创始人兼首席执行官，这是一家总部位于阿联酋的领先媒体生态公司。凭借在欧洲、美国以及自 2014 年起在阿联酋共 20 年的市场营销和商业经验，他曾打造并出售两家电商企业，均实现七位数美元级别退出。如今，他在迪拜持续扩张 ICN Media，并坚信长期成功基于两大支柱：正确的心态和高质量的人脉连接。
Biography_EN: Dani Topala is the Founder & CEO of ICN Media, a leading UAE-based media ecosystem. With 20 years of marketing and business experience across Europe, the United States, and since 2014 in the UAE, he has built and sold two e-commerce companies in 7-figure exits. Now scaling ICN Media from Dubai, Dani believes that long-term success is built on two pillars: right attitude and elite connections.
Interview1_ZH: Dani Topala，您在ICN Media担任Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？

Interview2_EN: You’ve built ICN Media in the UAE after years of entrepreneurship. Compared with Europe and the US, what is unique about the Middle Eastern rhythm of content distribution and brand partnerships?
Interview3_ZH: 作为曾多次成功退出的创始人，如果要给 Web3 内容创业者一条“如何搭建可出售资产而不是个人 IP”的建议，你会怎么说？
Interview3_EN: As a founder with multiple successful exits, what advice would you give Web3 media builders on creating a sellable asset rather than just a personal brand?

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Dan Murphy 是常驻阿联酋的 CNBC 主持人与记者，从中东核心地区报道全球商业、市场、经济和地缘政治。他同时主持 CNBC 标志性节目《Access Middle East》，该节目面向全球播出，深度专访国家元首、财政部长、央行行长、主权财富基金高管以及区域重要商业领袖和首席执行官。Dan 为观众提供对海湾地区快速演变的经济格局以及驱动区域转型的庞大资本的高层次洞察；他的现场报道涵盖沙特、阿联酋、卡塔尔等金融与地缘政治热点，从土耳其、以色列大选到埃及、俄罗斯的重要访谈。作为能源与地缘经济领域的重要声音，他凭借对全球能源市场的报道获得 2023 年 GI 国际能源新闻奖，并经常在维也纳报道欧佩克会议，还担任哥伦比亚大学全球能源政策中心的能源新闻研究员。Dan 亦常年在达沃斯、利雅得和迪拜的世界经济论坛报道，并主持逾 100 场聚焦中东、金融、银行、能源、科技、航空与阿拉伯世界领导力的高端论坛。2024 年，他被大西洋理事会评为 36 位“青年全球领袖”之一，并入选具有影响力的 Millennium Fellowship 项目。Dan 2015 年在新加坡加入 CNBC，是 2018 年该台迪拜与阿布扎比海湾分部启动团队的一员，在此之前，他曾在澳大利亚为 Sky News 报道。
Biography_EN: Dan Murphy is CNBC’s Anchor and Correspondent in the United Arab Emirates, covering global business, markets, economics, and geopolitics from the heart of the Middle East. Dan is also the host of Access Middle East - CNBC’s flagship program from the region. The show is broadcast worldwide and features in-depth interviews with Heads of State, Finance Ministers, Central Bank Governors, sovereign wealth fund executives, and leading regional leaders and CEOs. Dan provides high-level insight into the Gulf’s rapidly evolving economic landscape, and the vast pools of capital driving transformation across the region. His field reporting spans major financial hubs and geopolitical hotspots - from anchoring live coverage in Saudi Arabia, the UAE, and Qatar to covering critical elections in Turkey and Israel, and delivering high-stakes interviews in Egypt and Russia. A leading voice in energy and geo-economics, Dan was awarded the 2023 GI International Energy Journalism Award for his reporting on global energy markets. He regularly reports from OPEC meetings in Vienna, and also serves as an Energy Journalism Fellow at Columbia’s Center of Global Energy Policy. Dan regularly reports from the World Economic Forum in Davos, Riyadh, and Dubai, and has led more than 100 high-level panels at global conferences and events focusing on the Middle East, finance, banking, energy, technology, aviation, and leadership in the Arab world. In 2024, Dan was named one of thirty-six Young Global Leaders by the Atlantic Council and selected for the prestigious Millennium Fellowship, which recognizes leaders shaping the future of international affairs. Dan began his career with CNBC in Singapore in 2015, and was part of the team that launched the network’s Gulf bureaus in Dubai and Abu Dhabi in 2018. Prior to CNBC, he reported for Sky News in Australia.
Interview1_ZH: Dan Murphy，您在CNBC担任Anchor & Correspondent期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Anchor & Correspondent at CNBC, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你从 CNBC 前线报道海湾地区资本和能源格局的变化。和五年前相比，你在采访中听到的关于加密资产和代币化的提问有哪些明显变化？
Interview2_EN: Reporting for CNBC, you’ve watched capital and energy flows in the Gulf evolve. Compared with five years ago, how have the questions you hear about digital assets and tokenization changed in your interviews?
Interview3_ZH: 你经常在达沃斯、利雅得和迪拜主持高层对话，如果要用一句话总结“中东决策者对 Web3 的真实态度”，你会怎么说？
Interview3_EN: You frequently moderate panels in Davos, Riyadh, and Dubai. In one sentence, how would you summarize the real attitude of Middle Eastern decision‑makers toward Web3?

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: David Wachsman 是 Wachsman 的创始人兼首席执行官，这是一家数字资产行业内规模最大的专业传播公司。如今，Wachsman 在洛杉矶、迈阿密、华盛顿特区、纽约、伦敦、都柏林、日内瓦和新加坡等地拥有逾 120 名全职专业人士。自 2015 年以来，David 及其团队重塑了全球媒体和公众对区块链及其相关领域的认知，他们为数百家先锋企业提供咨询，并持续为行业内众多体量最大、知名度最高的项目提供战略传播支持。
Biography_EN: David Wachsman is the founder and CEO of Wachsman, the largest specialized communications firm in the digital asset industry. Today, Wachsman has more than 120 full-time professionals working from offices in Los Angeles, Miami, Washington DC, New York, London, Dublin, Geneva, and Singapore.Since 2015, David and his firm have helped to shape the way the global media and their audiences view blockchain technology and everything that it touches. His staff have been counsel to hundreds of pioneering firms and continue to advise many of the largest and highest profile players in the space.

Biography_ZH: Denitza Valjavec 是 Propy 的联合创始人兼首席运营官，Propy 是一家诞生于硅谷的地产科技公司，在真实资产代币化和链上房地产交易方面走在行业前沿。作为全球知名的区块链倡导者，Denitza 推动了全球首批在以太坊及 NFT 形式完成的房产交易，持续推进 Propy 将传统房地产与区块链技术深度融合的使命。她经常受邀在全球重要会议发言，并在欧洲创立多家专注区块链教育的非营利组织，积极推动 AI、区块链与产权交汇处的创新。
Biography_EN: Denitza Valjavec is the Co-founder and COO at Propy, a Silicon Valley–born proptech company pioneering real-world asset tokenization and onchain real estate transactions. A globally recognized blockchain advocate, Denitsa led the world’s first property sales on Ethereum and as NFTs, driving Propy’s mission to merge traditional real estate with blockchain technology. She is a frequent speaker at leading global events and a founder of EU-based non-profits for blockchain education. She champions innovation at the intersection of AI, blockchain, and property rights.

Biography_ZH: Derek 是 WalletConnect 的首席技术官，也是多项主流区块链标准的作者。凭借在 Amazon、Venmo 及多家初创公司的十多年经验，他曾参与扩展全球级金融科技与 Web3 平台；在 WalletConnect，他主导开源创新，并制定推动区块链互操作性的技术标准。
Biography_EN: Derek is the CTO of WalletConnect and author of several common blockchain standards. Interview1_ZH: Derek Rein，您在WalletConnect担任CTO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
