Interview3_ZH: 从 Amazon 和 Venmo 到 Web3，你对“支付体验”的理解不断演化。你现在设计一条新的用户路径时，最常删除掉的是哪一种步骤或提示？
Interview3_EN: From Amazon and Venmo to Web3, your view of “payment experience” has evolved. When you design a new user flow today, what kind of step or prompt do you most often remove?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Anish Shivdasani 博士是一位企业家与战略顾问，在数字资产领域具有深厚专长。作为连接加密和传统金融的策略家与思想领袖，他帮助机构、投资者与创新者搭建新旧金融世界的桥梁。Anish 曾在中东和北非地区多次创办并成功退出初创企业，目前领导罗兰贝格的全球数字资产业务，为交易所、银行、监管机构、Web3 项目、比特币矿工和投资者提供咨询服务。
Biography_EN: Dr Anish Shivdasani is an entrepreneur and strategy consultant with deep expertise in digital assets. A strategist and thought leader at the intersection of crypto and TradFi, he helps institutions, investors, and innovators bridge old and new financial worlds. Anish has scaled and exited startups in MENA, and currently heads the global digital asset practice at Roland Berger where he advises exchanges, banks, regulators, Web3 projects, btc miners and investors
Interview1_ZH: Dr Anish Shivdasani，您在Roland Berger担任Head of Digital Assets期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Head of Digital Assets at Roland Berger, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在罗兰贝格负责全球数字资产业务，也亲自创业。你观察到传统金融机构在进入加密时最容易高估和低估的各一项是什么？
Interview2_EN: Leading the global digital asset practice at Roland Berger and as a founder, what do you see TradFi institutions most overestimate and most underestimate when entering crypto?
Interview3_ZH: 当你和监管者或央行讨论“把旧金融系统桥接到新世界”时，哪一个论点最容易让他们从抵触转向开放？
Interview3_EN: When speaking with regulators or central banks about bridging old and new finance, which argument most often shifts them from resistance to openness?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Hamid Haqparwar 博士同时担任 AGMC 首席执行官以及 Albatha Automotive Group 董事，负责宝马集团旗下 BMW、MINI、劳斯莱斯和 BMW Motorrad 品牌在该地区的业务。在宝马集团近二十年的职业生涯中，他曾在多个国家和职能岗位任职，为覆盖 13 个市场的业务与销售增长发挥关键作用。自 2018 年起，他出任宝马集团中东区董事总经理，以其战略领导力、在挑战时期的韧性和前瞻思维推动业务成功。他毕业于德国曼海姆大学工商管理专业，随后在美国西卡罗来纳大学取得 MBA，并在瑞士圣加仑大学获得博士学位。
Biography_EN: Dr. Hamid Haqparwar holds the dual position of CEO of AGMC, overseeing BMW Group brands including BMW, MINI, Rolls-Royce and BMW Motorrad, and Director of Albatha Automotive Group. Following a career with BMW Group spanning nearly two decades and through several countries and functions, he has been instrumental in driving business and sales across 13 markets in the region. Appointed to his last role as Managing Director of BMW Group Middle East in 2018, his strategic leadership, resilience during challenging times and forward-thinking approach have played a key role in his successful career.Haqparwar graduated in Business Administration from the University of Mannheim, Germany, he went on to earn an MBA degree from Western Carolina University in the US and a PhD from the University of St Gallen, Switzerland.
Interview1_ZH: Dr. Hamid Haqparwar，您在AGMC担任CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CEO at AGMC, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你负责多个豪华汽车品牌在中东 13 个市场的业务。站在汽车和出行行业的角度，你认为区块链和数字资产最先会在哪一个环节真正改变用户体验？
Interview2_EN: Overseeing multiple premium car brands across 13 markets, from an automotive and mobility perspective, which part of the value chain do you expect blockchain and digital assets to transform the customer experience first?
Interview3_ZH: 面对越来越年轻、数字化的消费者，你会怎样想象一套结合车机系统、忠诚积分和链上身份的“下一代车主关系”？
Interview3_EN: With a younger, more digital customer base, how do you imagine a next‑generation owner relationship that combines in‑car systems, loyalty points, and on‑chain identity?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Mohamed Al Hemairy 博士是软件工程与创新教授，也是该地区新兴技术的重要倡导者。作为阿联酋区块链与 AI 协会主席，他在数字化转型、Web3.0 与人工智能国家级生态建设中发挥核心作用，推动政府、产业与学界之间的协同。他还是 Cert Link Project 的创始人兼首席执行官，这是一个基于区块链的学术证书验证平台，使阿联酋在教育科技转型领域走在前列。Al Hemairy 博士曾被选为瑞士 BSV 区块链委员会顾问成员，参与其战略方向、标准制定与企业级区块链采用工作。凭借逾 20 年经验以及对 350 多项国际专利的统筹，他被视为塑造 Web3、AI 与创新政策的重要力量，并与包括 Binance 在内的一流交易所以及阿联酋主要科技园区紧密合作，加速 Web3 采用、人才培养和数字创新的未来。
Biography_EN: Dr. Mohamed Al Hemairy is a Professor of Software Engineering and Innovation, and a leading ‎regional advocate for emerging technologies. As Chairman of the Blockchain & AI Association -‎ UAE, he plays a central role in building national ecosystems in Digital Transformation, Web3.0, ‎and AI, driving collaboration between government, industry, and academia.‎ He is also the Founder & CEO of the Cert Link Project, a blockchain-powered platform for secure ‎academic credential verification, positioning UAE innovation at the forefront of global EdTech ‎transformation.‎ Dr. Al Hemairy was selected as an Advisory Member of the BSV Blockchain Council ‎‎(Switzerland), contributing to strategic direction, standards development, and enterprise ‎blockchain adoption.‎ With over 20 years of experience and more than 350 international patents overseen, Dr. Al ‎Hemairy is recognized as a key influencer shaping Web3, AI, and innovation policy across the ‎region. He works closely with global partners, Tier-1 exchanges including Binance, and major UAE ‎technology hubs to accelerate Web3 adoption, talent development, and the future of digital ‎innovation.‎
Interview1_ZH: Dr. Mohamed Al Hemairy，您在UAE Blockchain & AI Association担任Chairman期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Chairman at UAE Blockchain & AI Association, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在阿联酋搭建了区块链与 AI 行业协会，也推进教育和政府项目。你认为一个国家要真正形成 Web3 生态，最关键的不是资金而是什么“制度型基础设施”？
Interview2_EN: You chair a Blockchain & AI association and work with government and academia in the UAE. For a country to build a real Web3 ecosystem, what “institutional infrastructure” matters more than capital?
Interview3_ZH: 你在 Cert Link Project 用区块链做学历认证。你如何说服传统高校和用人单位相信，这不仅是“技术噱头”，而是会改变他们日常流程的工具？
Interview3_EN: With Cert Link Project you use blockchain for credential verification. How do you convince traditional universities and employers that this is not just a gimmick but a tool that will change their daily workflows?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: JieNi 是知名加密分析师与交易员，同时是 JieNi 社区的创始人。作为 2025 年币安广场 Top 10 创作者及 2023 年华语加密 KOL 影响力人物，他以对市场结构的深度研究和周期驱动方法论而闻名。常驻墨尔本的他在过去八年中经历多轮牛熊周期，将在墨尔本攻读区块链方向博士期间的学术研究与实战交易经验相结合，专注宏观趋势、链上行为和叙事演进，致力于为全球用户输出清晰可执行的市场洞察。
Biography_EN: JieNi is a leading crypto analyst, trader, and founder of the JieNi Community. As one of the Binance Square Top 10 Creators of 2025 and a 2023 Chinese Crypto KOL Influencer, he is known for his deep-dive market structure analysis and cycle-driven research. Based in Melbourne, JeNi has spent the past eight years navigating multiple bull and bear cycles, combining academic blockchain research from his PhD studies in Melbourne with practical trading insights. He focuses on macro trends, on-chain behavior, and narrative development, aiming to translate complex market signals into clear, actionable insights for global users.
Interview1_ZH: Dr. JieNi，您在JieNi Community担任Community Founder & Crypto Analyst期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Community Founder & Crypto Analyst at JieNi Community, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你既做学术研究，又深度参与交易与内容创作。你如何在自己的交易策略中把“博士论文里的模型”和“盘面直觉”结合起来？
Interview2_EN: You combine academic research with active trading and content creation. How do you blend the models from your PhD work with real‑time market intuition in your own strategies?
Interview3_ZH: 你常通过周期与结构视角解析市场。对于刚开始研究周期的新手，你会建议他们先从哪一个时间尺度入手，才能避免被短期波动“洗走信心”？
Interview3_EN: You often frame the market in terms of cycles and structure. For beginners studying cycles, which time frame should they start with so they don’t lose confidence to short‑term noise?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Eleanor 是 Binance 的总法律顾问，全面负责公司的法律事务。她还与全球合规团队紧密合作，支持 Binance 在与各国监管机构和政策制定者协作的前提下，负责任地推动行业发展。在此之前，Eleanor 曾任 Binance 亚太及中东和北非地区法律负责人，统筹两大区域的相关事务，并管理由监管、并购、商法与诉讼领域专家组成的律师团队。她在为 Binance 争取多个司法辖区（包括巴林、迪拜和新西兰）的虚拟资产服务牌照和注册中发挥了关键作用。Eleanor 拥有近 20 年私人执业与企业内部法务经验，在加入 Binance 前曾在美国律师事务所工作 10 余年，包括在世达律师事务所（Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP and Affiliates），专长于诉讼与争议解决。她以一等荣誉毕业于剑桥大学。
Biography_EN: Eleanor is the General Counsel for Binance, where she leads the company’s legal affairs. She also works closely with the global compliance team to support Binance’s commitment to responsibly grow the industry in close collaboration with regulators and policymakers globally. Previously, Eleanor was the Head of Legal for APAC and MENA for Binance, where she oversaw matters in the two regions and managed a team of specialist lawyers in regulatory, M&A, commercial and litigation. She played an instrumental role in securing virtual asset service provider licenses and registrations for Binance in several jurisdictions, including Bahrain, Dubai, and New Zealand. Eleanor has nearly two decades of experience in both private practice and in-house roles. Before joining Binance, Eleanor spent more than ten years at US law firms including Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP and Affiliates, where she focused on litigation and contentious matters. Eleanor graduated from University of Cambridge with First Class Honors.
Interview1_ZH: Eleanor Hughes，您在Binance担任General Counsel期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the General Counsel at Binance, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Binance 先后负责区域和全球法务工作，经历了多个司法辖区的牌照申请过程。回头看，你认为“赢得监管信任”的关键时刻通常发生在谈判的哪一个细节？
Interview2_EN: You’ve led regional and now global legal efforts at Binance, including multiple licensing processes. Looking back, at which specific stage or detail do you usually see the turning point for earning a regulator’s trust?
Interview3_ZH: 站在总法律顾问的视角，如果要给创业团队一条“如何在产品设计阶段就考虑好合规”的建议，你会提醒他们从哪三件小事做起？
Interview3_EN: From a general counsel’s perspective, if you had to give founders one piece of advice on “baking compliance into product design,” what three small, concrete actions should they start with?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Eleanor Terrett 是一名记者，也是播客《Crypto In America》的联合主持人。过去两年里，她成为加密政策与监管新闻领域的代表性声音和可信来源，其报道多次获得包括白宫加密与 AI 顾问 David Sacks 以及 Strategy 创始人 Michael Saylor 在内的行业领袖认可。在 2024 年转向独立媒体之前，她在 FOX Business 工作九年，其中四年专注与资深财经记者兼作家 Charles Gasparino 一同报道加密政策。
Biography_EN: Eleanor Terrett is a journalist and co-host of the Crypto In America podcast. Over the past two years, she has become a leading voice and trusted source for news relating to crypto policy and regulation. Her coverage has been recognized by industry leaders like White House Crypto and AI Czar David Sacks and Strategy founder Michael Saylor. Before her move into independent media in March, she spent four of her nine years at FOX Business covering crypto policy alongside veteran financial journalist and author Charles Gasparino.
Interview1_ZH: Eleanor Terrett，您在Crypto In America担任Journalist, Host期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Journalist, Host at Crypto In America, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你近年来密集报道加密政策与监管动态，很多消息都会迅速在社区引发情绪波动。你如何判断一条监管新闻是“结构性转折”还是“短期噪音”？
Interview2_EN: You’ve closely covered crypto policy and regulation, with many of your stories moving sentiment quickly. How do you distinguish between a regulatory headline that signals a structural shift and one that’s just short‑term noise?
Interview3_ZH: 从传统财经观众到 Web3 社群，你在做访谈和播客时，会如何调整提问角度，既能保持批判性，又不让受访者完全进入“公关模式”？
Interview3_EN: When interviewing for both mainstream finance audiences and Web3 natives, how do you adjust your questioning so you stay critical without pushing guests entirely into “PR mode”?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Eli 是 StarkWare 的联合创始人兼首席执行官，并担任公司董事会主席。自 2001 年在希伯来大学获得理论计算机科学博士学位以来，他一直从事密码学与计算完整性的零知识证明研究。Eli 是 STARK、FRI 和 Zerocash 协议的共同发明人，也是 Zcash 公司创始科学家之一；他曾在普林斯顿高等研究院、哈佛和麻省理工学院担任研究职位，最近则是以色列理工学院计算机科学教授，之后离职创立 StarkWare。
Biography_EN: Eli is a Co-Founder and CEO of StarkWare, and Chairman of its Board of Directors. He has been researching cryptographic and zero knowledge proofs of computational integrity ever since he received his Phd in Theoretical Computer Science from the Hebrew University in 2001. Eli is a co-inventor of the STARK, FRI and Zerocash protocols and a Founding Scientist of the Zcash Company. Over the years he held research positions at the Institute for Advanced Study at Princeton, Harvard and MIT, and, most recently, was a Professor of CS at Technion, which he left to co-found StarkWare.
Interview1_ZH: Eli Ben Sasson，您在StarkWare Industries担任Co-Founder & CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder & CEO at StarkWare Industries, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 STARK 和 STARKWare 领域深耕多年。今天你如何向非技术的监管者解释：零知识证明不仅是“隐私工具”，也是金融市场基础设施的一部分？
Interview2_EN: You’ve been pioneering STARKs and StarkWare for years. How do you now explain to non‑technical regulators that zero‑knowledge proofs are not just a “privacy gadget” but a core piece of financial market infrastructure?
Interview3_ZH: 从纯研究到大规模商用，你觉得零知识技术目前最大的瓶颈已经从数学转移到了哪一个环节？你期待生态中谁来补上这块拼图？
Interview3_EN: Moving from pure research to large‑scale production, where do you see the main bottleneck for ZK today shifting from math to, and who in the ecosystem do you hope will step up to solve it?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Elizabeth 是亚洲知名 Web3 意见领袖之一，拥有超过 14 万粉丝。她创作涵盖叙事、代币经济与市场洞察等内容，并采访多位顶级创始人；同时与亚洲各地的加密项目合作，帮助其连接全球市场。
Biography_EN: Elizabeth is a leading Asian Web3 influencer with 140K+ followers. She creates content across narratives, token economics, and market insights, and has interviewed top founders. She works with crypto projects across Asia to bridge global markets.
Interview1_ZH: Elizabeth L，您在Elizabeth担任Influencer期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Influencer at Elizabeth, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在亚洲做 Web3 内容和社群，拥有大量粉丝。过去一年，你观察到用户对“叙事”与“基本面”的兴趣占比有怎样的变化？
Interview2_EN: As a leading Asian Web3 influencer with a large following, how have you seen the audience’s interest shift over the last year between “narratives” and “fundamentals”?
Interview3_ZH: 如果你要给普通用户设计一套“30 天内容挑战”，帮助他们从被动吃瓜变成主动研究者，你会安排哪三类输出任务？
Interview3_EN: If you designed a “30‑day content challenge” to turn passive followers into active researchers, what three types of outputs would you ask them to produce?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Ella Zhang 长期投身前沿科技与数字资产领域。作为 Binance Labs 的创始负责人以及如今与 CZ 共同打造的 YZi Labs 的联合建设者，她始终站在 Web3 关键变革的中心。Ella 曾在 Kleiner Perkins、Google、斯坦福商学院接受系统训练，并两次创业，联合创立供应链与客服方向的 AI 初创公司；她将价值投资的纪律与长期支持大胆创意的信念结合起来，从搭建全球投资平台到扶持能以执行力证明愿景的创始人，形成一条贯穿始终的职业路径。
Biography_EN: Ella Zhang has spent her career shaping frontier technologies and digital assets. As the founding head of Binance Labs and now co-builder of YZi Labs with CZ, she has been at the center of Web3’s most defining shifts.Trained at Kleiner Perkins, Google, Stanford GSB, and twice as a founder herself, Ella combines the discipline of value investing with the conviction to back bold ideas for the long term. Her journey spans co-founding AI startups in supply chain and customer service, leading global investment platforms, and supporting founders who prove their vision through execution.
Interview1_ZH: Ella Zhang，您在YZi Labs担任Head期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Head at YZi Labs, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你从 VC、互联网巨头到 Binance Labs，再到 YZi Labs，一直站在早期项目筛选一线。你最近一年里，在创始人身上最看重、但传统简历上往往看不到的一个特质是什么？
Interview2_EN: From VC and big tech to Binance Labs and now YZi Labs, you’ve been on the front line of early‑stage selection. Over the past year, what founder trait have you come to value most that almost never appears on a traditional résumé?
Interview3_ZH: 你常提到“价值投资 + 长期主义”。具体到 Web3 投资，你是如何在面对短期情绪和巨额 TVL 时，坚持自己的节奏与标准的？
Interview3_EN: You often speak about combining value investing with long‑term conviction. In Web3 specifically, how do you keep to your own pace and standards when markets are driven by short‑term hype and giant TVL numbers?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Eowyn Chen 致力于以超高速推动加密普及，为更多人提供金融可及性与机会。她是 Trust Wallet 的首席执行官，该钱包是全球领先的自托管 Web3 钱包与入口，服务全球逾 2 亿用户。此前，Eowyn 曾任 Binance 副总裁，负责并领导核心市场团队，帮助平台用户规模从数千万增长到数亿。进入区块链行业之前，她曾为多家国际初创企业在美国的市场进入战略与运营提供咨询，并在纽约的 Oliver Wyman 从事金融服务管理咨询工作。她毕业于哈佛学院，主修以科学为导向的历史，并始终以“保持孩童般的好奇心，追寻人类与社会的基本原理”为人生理念。
Biography_EN: Eowyn Chen is passionate about hyper-scaling crypto adoption to empower people with access and opportunity. She is the CEO of Trust Wallet, the world’s leading self-custody Web3 wallet and Web3 gateway, serving over 200 million users globally. Previously, Eowyn was a VP at Binance, building and leading its central marketing team to help grow users from tens of millions into hundreds of millions. Before diving into the blockchain industry, she helped international startups with their go-to-market strategy and operations in the US and was trained as a management consultant in financial services at Oliver Wyman in New York. Trained as a science-minded history concentrator at Harvard College, Eowyn always aspires to be a child-like truth seeker of fundamental principles of human individuals and society.
Interview1_ZH: Eowyn Chen，您在Trust Wallet担任CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CEO at Trust Wallet, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: Trust Wallet 既是大众入口，又承载极高的安全责任。你如何在内部团队中平衡“更快集成新链、新玩法”和“不给普通用户增加复杂度”这两种诉求？
Interview2_EN: Trust Wallet is both a mass‑market entry point and a critical security layer. How do you balance, within your team, the push to “integrate more chains and features faster” with the need not to overwhelm everyday users?
Interview3_ZH: 你经常谈到用户教育和自我托管的重要性。如果要你用一句话说服传统互联网用户下载第一个自托管钱包，那句话会是什么？
Interview3_EN: You often emphasize user education and self‑custody. If you had to convince a Web2 user to download their first self‑custody wallet with just one sentence, what would you say?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Erbil Karaman 是 Huma Finance 的联合创始人，该项目是首个 PayFi 网络。他曾在多家定义品类的硅谷公司（包括 Facebook、Lyft 和 EarnIn）负责产品与增长，是活跃的 Web3 项目投资人和顾问；同时担任 Thiel 基金会 “20 Under 20” 奖学金项目的导师——Vitalik Buterin 正是在该项目中最初构建了 Ethereum。
Biography_EN: Erbil Karaman is the Co-founder of Huma Finance, the first PayFi Network. He previously led product and growth at category-defining Silicon Valley companies including Facebook, Lyft, and EarnIn. An active investor and advisor to leading Web3 projects, Erbil also served as a mentor for the Thiel Foundation’s 20 Under 20 Fellowship — where Vitalik Buterin first built Ethereum.
Interview1_ZH: Erbil Karaman，您在Huma Finance担任Co-Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder at Huma Finance, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Facebook、Lyft 等公司主导过多款产品，如今在 Huma Finance 打造 PayFi 网络。你怎样向传统金融机构解释：“收入流和现金流也可以像 DeFi 资产一样被编排和拆分”？
Interview2_EN: Having led products at Facebook, Lyft and now building the PayFi network at Huma Finance, how do you explain to TradFi institutions that income streams and cash flows can be orchestrated and sliced just like DeFi assets?
Interview3_ZH: 在你服务过的创业者中，哪些特质最能帮助他们真正理解“信用、数据和代币激励”三者之间的微妙平衡？
Interview3_EN: Among the founders you advise, which personal traits best equip them to truly understand the delicate balance between credit, data, and token incentives?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Eric 是 Self Labs 的首席执行官兼联合创始人，公司致力于为互联网构建以隐私优先的可扩展信任层。Self Labs 于 2024 年初由 Celo 核心团队成员创立，提供大规模可扩展的人类身份验证基础设施，在保护个人隐私的前提下服务数以亿计用户。在创办 Self Labs 之前，Eric 在 Celo 基金会工作四年，推动这一以太坊二层网络与全球合作伙伴生态的发展，支持面向普惠金融的 Web3 应用建设。他最近的职位是 Celo 基金会执行董事，此前则担任全球开发者关系负责人。加入基金会前，Eric 在 Facebook 工作四年，负责开源软件倡导，之后加入数字钱包公司 Novi Financial 担任开源负责人，支持 Diem 开发者社区。他还是资深创业者，先后创办 I Can Has Cheezburger?（2007 年出售）、旅行类应用 WhatChefsEat、LeiFresh、HawaiiFareSurfer，以及移动应用 Simplehoney（2013 年被 Ripple 收购）。Eric 是 Nalukai 基金会导师，支持立志成为创业者和初创领袖的高中生，并在风投机构 500 Startups 担任四年导师。2014 年，他发起 Doge4Water 活动，为慈善机构 charity: water 募集了 4,400 万枚 Dogecoin，用于发展中国家饮水项目。
Biography_EN: Eric is CEO and co-founder of Self Labs, building a scalable trust layer for the internet that puts privacy first. Self Labs was started by Celo core team members early 2024 to provide essential infrastructure for verifying human identity while preserving individual privacy, with the capacity to scale for hundreds of millions of usersEric co-founded Self Labs following four years at the Celo Foundation, stewarding the growth of Ethereum Layer 2 with a rich ecosystem of global partners building Web3 applications that help create a more inclusive global financial system. Eric most recently served as Executive Director of the Celo Foundation, following more than two years as the Global Head of Developer Relations. Prior to joining the Foundation, Eric spent four years at Facebook, advocating for open source software, before joining the digital wallet provider Novi Financial as Head of Open Source, supporting the Diem Developer Community. Eric also has extensive entrepreneurial experience, having founded I Can Has Cheezburger?, which sold in 2007; travel apps WhatChefsEat, LeiFresh, and HawaiiFareSurfer; and the consumer mobile app Simplehoney, which was acquired by Ripple in 2013.Eric is a mentor at the Nalukai Foundation, supporting high school students aspiring to be entrepreneurs and startup leaders. He spent four years as a mentor at 500 Startups, a venture capital firm with 33 portfolio companies worth more than $1 billion. In 2014, Eric led Doge4Water, raising 44M Dogecoin for charity:water, a nonprofit organization bringing clean drinking water to people in developing countries.
Interview1_ZH: Eric Nakagawa，您在Self担任CEO & Co-Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CEO & Co-Founder at Self, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你从 I Can Has Cheezburger? 到 Celo 与 Self Labs，一直在探索“互联网信任层”。你认为要让十亿人用上链上身份，最大挑战是技术、政策还是文化？
Interview2_EN: From I Can Has Cheezburger? to Celo and Self Labs, you’ve long explored the internet’s trust layer. For bringing on‑chain identity to a billion people, is the biggest challenge technical, policy‑related, or cultural?
Interview3_ZH: 作为多次创业和开源布道者，你会如何建议年轻开发者在 Web3 时代选择项目：优先看技术前沿、社区质量，还是可持续商业模式？
Interview3_EN: As a serial founder and open‑source advocate, how would you advise young developers choosing projects in Web3: prioritize technical frontier, community quality, or sustainable business models?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Fadi Ghandour 是 Wamda Group 的执行主席，该平台致力于在中东和北非投资、培育并搭建创业生态系统。他同时是 Aramex 的创始人，这是一家全球领先的物流公司。Ghandour 在职业生涯最初 30 年中担任 Aramex 首席执行官，将公司打造为新兴市场领先物流企业，员工超过 15,000 人，在 90 个国家设有 250 余个办公室。他两次推动公司上市：先是在纳斯达克，使其成为首家登陆该交易所的阿拉伯世界企业，之后又在迪拜金融市场挂牌；目前他仍活跃于 Aramex 董事会。作为连续创业者，他参与创建、投资并推出数十家企业和非营利机构，涵盖数字科技、酒店、健身与健康等领域。出于对社会影响力与社会企业的热情，Ghandour 创立并担任 Ruwwad for Development 主席，这是一个由私营部门发起的社区赋能平台，在中东北非多国帮助弱势社区通过社会行动、公民参与、教育与金融包容来打破边缘化。他还在多家全球与地区性公司、高校及非营利组织的董事会担任职务。
Biography_EN: Fadi Ghandour is the Executive Chairman of Wamda Group, a platform that invests, nurtures and builds entrepreneurship eco-systems across the Middle East and North Africa. Mr. Ghandour is also the Founder of Aramex, one of the leading global logistics companies. Mr. Ghandour spent the first 30 years of his work life as CEO of Aramex, building the company, making it the leading emerging market logistics company, employing over 15,000 people working in over 250 offices in 90 countries. He took the company public twice, first on Nasdaq making it the first company from the Arab world to do so, then on Dubai Financial market. He continues to be active on the Aramex board. Mr. Ghandour is a serial entrepreneur. In his career, he was involved with founding, investing and launching tens of companies and non-profits, ranging from digital tech, hospitality, fitness & wellness. Passionate about impact and social entrepreneurship, Mr. Ghandour founded and chairs Ruwwad for Development, a private sector led community empowerment platform that helps marginalized communities, across several countries in the MENA region, overcome marginalization through activism, civic engagement, education and financial inclusion. Mr. Ghandour also served and continues to serve on several global and regional boards of companies, education institutions and non-profits.
Interview1_ZH: Fadi Ghandour，您在Wamda Capital担任Executive Chairman期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Executive Chairman at Wamda Capital, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你既打造了 Aramex，又通过 Wamda 深度孵化创业生态。你如何评估一个 MENA Web3 团队是真正“解决区域痛点”，而不是在复制海外叙事？
Interview2_EN: You built Aramex and now nurture startups through Wamda. How do you assess whether a MENA Web3 team is truly solving a regional pain point rather than copy‑pasting narratives from abroad?
Interview3_ZH: 对那些刚从传统行业转向创业的创始人，你会如何建议他们在“追风口”和“打基础设施”之间做选择？
Interview3_EN: For founders leaving traditional industries for startups, how would you guide them in choosing between chasing hot narratives and building slow, foundational infrastructure?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: 热爱挑战、学习和探索新技术。
Biography_EN: I love challenges, learning, and exploring new technologies.
Interview1_ZH: Major Faisal Alyaqoubi，您在Ministry of Interior担任Head of Virtual Assets Division期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Head of Virtual Assets Division at Ministry of Interior, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在安全、国防与新技术交汇处拥有独特经验。你如何看待区块链在国家安全和关键基础设施保护中的实际用武之地？
Interview2_EN: With your background at the intersection of security, defense, and emerging tech, where do you see blockchain having real, practical applications in national security and critical infrastructure protection?
Interview3_ZH: 在与政府和军方同事的交流中，你会用怎样的例子来解释“去中心化信任”不会削弱主权，反而可以增强国家韧性？
Interview3_EN: When speaking with government or military colleagues, what example do you use to explain that decentralized trust doesn’t weaken sovereignty, but can actually enhance national resilience?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Title_ZH: Data & GenAI Go To Market Leader
Title_EN: Data & GenAI Go To Market Leader
Biography_ZH: Farhin 负责 AWS 英国与爱尔兰地区的数据、分析及生成式 AI/ML 市场战略，是全球专业团队的一员。她领导的专家团队在数据分析、存储架构、机器学习与生成式 AI 方面具备深厚领域知识，为各行业组织在数字化转型过程中提供战略指导以及业务与技术领导力。凭借 15 年技术、解决方案销售与业务拓展经验，她服务过金融服务、制造、电力与公用事业以及旅游与交通等多个行业，从大型企业到独立软件厂商（ISV）均有合作。作为行业活动上的常客演讲者，Farhin 致力于让 AWS 的数据与 GenAI 创新惠及各类组织；她也是 Women at AWS 的全球大使，积极通过 STEM 项目推动科技领域的多元与包容。Farhin 常驻英国，拥有商业计算与信息系统学位。
Biography_EN: Farhin leads the Data, Analytics and Generative AI/ML Go-to-Market for UK and Ireland as part of the Worldwide Specialist organization at AWS. Her team of specialists bring deep domain expertise in data analytics, storage architectures, machine learning and generative AI technologies, providing strategic guidance, business and technical leadership to organizations across diverse industries as they navigate their transformation journeys.With 15 years of experience in technology, solution sales and business development, Farhin has worked extensively across diverse industry verticals including Financial Services, Manufacturing, Power & Utilities, and Travel & Tourism, partnering with organizations ranging from Enterprises to ISVs.A frequent speaker at industry events, Farhin champions making AWS's Data and GenAI innovations accessible to all organizations. She serves as a Global Ambassador for Women at AWS and actively promotes diversity in tech through STEM initiatives. Based in the UK, Farhin holds a degree in Business Computing and Information Systems.
Interview1_ZH: Farhin Khan，您在Amazon Web Services担任Data & GenAI Go To Market Leader期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Data & GenAI Go To Market Leader at Amazon Web Services, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 AWS 负责数据与 GenAI 的 GTM，同时深度接触金融与传统企业。你如何帮助这些机构从“试验性用例”升级到“把 AI/区块链嵌入核心业务”？
Interview2_EN: Leading Data and GenAI go‑to‑market at AWS, you work closely with financial and enterprise clients. How do you help them move from “experimental POCs” to embedding AI or blockchain into core business processes?
Interview3_ZH: 在推动多元与女性科技人才方面，你最希望 Web3 公司在招聘与团队文化上做出哪一项具体改变？
Interview3_EN: In promoting diversity and women in tech, what one concrete change would you most like to see Web3 companies make in their hiring or culture?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Farokh 是 Rug Radio 创始人兼主席，同时也担任《Decrypt》母公司 DASTAN 的负责人，通过去中心化预测市场 MYRIAD 等创新产品重塑媒体的未来。
Biography_EN: Farokh is the founder and President of Rug Radio and Decrypt’s parent company DASTAN, shaping the future of media with innovative decentralized prediction market MYRIAD
Interview1_ZH: Farokh Sarmad，您在Myriad Markets, Rug Radio, Decrypt担任President & Co-Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the President & Co-Founder at Myriad Markets, Rug Radio, Decrypt, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你通过 Rug Radio 和 DASTAN 重塑媒体形态。你认为真正能体现“去中心化媒体价值”的，不是投票权，而是哪一种创作者与听众之间的新关系？
Interview2_EN: With Rug Radio and DASTAN, you’re reshaping media. Beyond token voting, what new kind of relationship between creators and audiences best showcases the real value of decentralized media?
Interview3_ZH: 如果给你一次机会从零重启一家媒体 DAO，你会在哪一个环节设计得和传统媒体完全不同：选题机制、分发算法还是收益分配？
Interview3_EN: If you could reboot a media DAO from scratch, which part would you design to be radically different from traditional media: topic selection, distribution algorithms, or revenue sharing?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Fisher Yu 博士是 Babylon 项目的联合创始人兼首席技术官，致力于让比特币在无需信任的前提下“更具生产力”。Babylon 首个协议——无信任比特币质押协议，自 2024 年 8 月上线以来，已激活超过 100 亿美元原生比特币。创立 Babylon 之前，Fisher 曾担任多条一层区块链在共识安全方面的技术顾问，并在杜比实验室负责去中心化云基础设施的技术工作负责人。他拥有信息论博士学位，是区块链扩容与数据可用性领域两项高被引技术的主要发明人。
Biography_EN: Dr. Fisher Yu is the Co-Founder and CTO of the Babylon project, focusing on making Bitcoin productive, trustlessly. The first Babylon protocol, the trustless Bitcoin staking protocol, has activated over $10B worth of native Bitcoin since its launch in August 2024. Prior to Babylon, Fisher was an advisor of several L1 blockchains on their consensus security, and the tech lead of Dolby Labs on decentralised cloud infrastructure. Fisher holds a Ph.D. degree in Information Theory, and is the main inventor of two of the most cited technologies in blockchain scalability and data availability.
Interview1_ZH: Fisher Yu，您在Babylon Labs担任Co-Founder & CTO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder & CTO at Babylon Labs, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Babylon 专注“让比特币更有生产力”。对于还只把比特币视为储值资产的人，你会如何解释“信任最小化质押”为什么不会破坏它的货币属性？
Interview2_EN: At Babylon you focus on “making Bitcoin productive.” For people who still see Bitcoin only as a store of value, how do you explain that trust‑minimized staking doesn’t undermine its monetary properties?
Interview3_ZH: 你从信息论走到共识安全和数据可用性。以你的视角，未来五年里，哪一种关于区块链安全的“主流认知”最有可能被证明是错误的？
Interview3_EN: Coming from information theory into consensus security and data availability, which widely‑held belief about blockchain security do you expect to be disproven in the next five years?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Gabby Dizon 是 Yield Guild Games（YGG）的联合创始人，拥有超过 20 年经验的资深游戏行业从业者。在创立 YGG 之前，Gabby 于 2014 年创立游戏工作室 Altitude Games，专注原创与授权的免费移动游戏，之后该公司被一家管理数十亿美元资产的澳大利亚家族办公室收购。他也是菲律宾游戏开发者协会（GDAP）的联合创始人，并担任两届主席。作为 Web3 游戏生态的坚定支持者，Gabby 是区块链游戏联盟（BGA）的创始董事会成员，同时活跃于天使投资。他的使命是帮助世界各地的人们通过 Web3 获得新的机会。
Biography_EN: Gabby Dizon is a Co-Founder of Yield Guild Games (YGG) and a game industry veteran with over 20 years of experience. Before YGG, Gabby was the co-founder and CEO of Altitude Games, a game studio established in 2014 with a focus on original and licensed titles in the free-to-play mobile game space. The company was later acquired by an Australian family office managing billions in assets. Gabby also co-founded the Game Developers Association of the Philippines (GDAP) and served as its President for two years. A strong advocate of the Web3 gaming ecosystem, Gabby is a founding board member of the Blockchain Game Alliance (BGA) and an active angel investor. His mission is to help people from all corners of the world find opportunities in Web3.
Interview1_ZH: Gabby Dizon，您在YGG Play担任Co-Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder at YGG Play, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在游戏行业超过 20 年，又在 YGG 推动 Web3 游戏经济。你怎么看待“边玩边赚”从狂热到冷静后的下一阶段？
Interview2_EN: With over 20 years in gaming and your work at YGG, how do you see the next phase of “play‑to‑earn” now that the initial hype has cooled?
Interview3_ZH: 如果要为传统游戏工作室设计一条“最低摩擦进入 Web3”的路径，你会先让他们从哪一个资产或行为开始上链？
Interview3_EN: If you were to design the lowest‑friction path for a traditional studio into Web3, which asset or player behavior would you put on‑chain first?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Interview1_EN: As the Chairman at Binance, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你既是创业者，也在国家层面推动数字资产和 CBDC。你如何防止央行数字货币项目在落地过程中，变成“只是一个更好用的网上银行”？
Interview2_EN: As both an entrepreneur and a national‑level advocate for digital assets and CBDCs, how do you prevent CBDC projects from turning into “just a better online banking app”?

Biography_ZH: 自 2017 年起活跃于加密领域的 Gaudenzio.ETH，在意大利及欧洲范围内被广泛视为加密教育、交易与社区建设的领军人物。他致力于让 Web3 更加易懂可及，弥合知识差距，并推动机构进入区块链生态。通过清晰的沟通与实践项目，他帮助打造一个更加知情且积极参与的加密社区。
Biography_EN: Active in the crypto space since 2017, Gaudenzio.ETH is widely recognized in Italy and Europe as a leading voice in crypto education, trading, and community growth. His work focuses on making Web3 accessible, bridging knowledge gaps, and supporting the onboarding of institutions into the blockchain ecosystem. Through clear communication and hands-on initiatives, he helps shape a more informed and engaged crypto community.
Interview1_ZH: Gaudenzio G，您在NeverLocal担任CMO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CMO at NeverLocal, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在意大利和欧洲做加密教育、交易和机构对接。过去两年里，你看到传统机构在与加密社区沟通时最大的语言障碍是什么？
Interview2_EN: Working on education, trading, and institutional onboarding in Italy and Europe, what has been the biggest communication gap between TradFi institutions and the crypto community over the past two years?
Interview3_ZH: 如果给你三分钟向一个保守的家族办公室推介 Web3，你会重点讲哪一种具体策略：比特币配置、代币化资产还是链上收益？
Interview3_EN: If you had three minutes to pitch Web3 to a conservative family office, which concrete strategy would you focus on first: Bitcoin allocation, tokenized assets, or on‑chain yield?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Title_ZH: Early Backer - Bitfury, Bestselling Author "And Then You Win"
Title_EN: Early Backer - Bitfury, Bestselling Author "And Then You Win"
Biography_ZH: George Kikvadze 是 Bitfury Group 的早期支持者，目前创立并管理风投机构 Cryptic8 VC，专注于科技与长寿交叉领域的投资。在 2013 年加入 Bitfury 之前，George 曾在 York Capital、AFK Sistema 与摩根士丹利工作。他在宾夕法尼亚大学沃顿商学院获得金融方向 MBA，并在约翰斯·霍普金斯大学高级国际研究学院（SAIS）取得国际关系与经济学硕士学位。George 还是 YPO 欧洲 One 分会成员，以及全球区块链商业委员会（GBBC）的创始成员与董事会成员。
Biography_EN: George Kikvadze is the early backer of Bitfury Group and is currently Founder of Cryptic8 VC, investing at the intersection of tech and longevity. Prior to joining Bitfury in 2013, George has worked at York Capital, AFK Sistema and Morgan Stanley. He obtained his MBA in Finance from the Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania, and his MA in International Relations and Economics from the Johns Hopkins School of Advanced International Studies (SAIS). George is a member of the Europe One YPO Club and is a Founding Member and Board Director of the Global Blockchain Business Council (GBBC).
Interview1_ZH: George Kikvadze，您在Bitfury担任Early Backer - Bitfury, Bestselling Author "And Then You Win"期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Early Backer - Bitfury, Bestselling Author "And Then You Win" at Bitfury, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你早期投资 Bitfury，如今在 Cryptic8 布局长寿科技与 Web3。你如何判断一个项目是真正在“把计算与生物结合”，而不是简单套用长寿概念？
Interview2_EN: As an early Bitfury backer now investing at the intersection of longevity and Web3 with Cryptic8, how do you tell whether a project truly fuses computation and biology versus just borrowing longevity buzzwords?
Interview3_ZH: 从你的经验看，传统能源、算力基础设施与区块链网络之间，未来十年里最有可能出现哪一种全新商业模式？
Interview3_EN: From your vantage point across energy, compute, and blockchain, what entirely new business model do you expect to emerge over the next decade?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Gerry Ho 是 Trust Wallet 的产品负责人，Trust Wallet 是全球领先的自托管 Web3 钱包，服务超过 2.1 亿用户。Gerry 在加密货币、交易平台和金融科技创新领域拥有逾十年经验，参与打造并扩展了多款行业内广泛使用的产品。在加入 Trust Wallet 之前，他担任 Aster 的首席运营官，主导去中心化交易相关业务；更早前，他曾出任 Binance.US 的高级副总裁、产品与运营负责人。在职业生涯早期，Gerry 是 BTCC 核心团队成员之一，参与建设业内首批永续合约交易所。Gerry 热衷于推动去中心化金融发展、提升 Web3 用户体验标准，并致力于打造让全球用户真正实现资产所有权与财务自由的产品。
Biography_EN: Gerry Ho is the Head of Product at Trust Wallet, the world’s leading self-custody Web3 wallet serving over 210 million users globally. With more than a decade of experience across crypto, trading platforms, and fintech innovation, Gerry has helped build and scale some of the industry’s most widely used products. Before joining Trust Wallet, Gerry served as COO of Aster, driving decentralized trading initiatives. Prior to that, he was SVP, Head of Product & Operations at Binance.US. Earlier in his career, Gerry was part of the core team at BTCC, helping build crypto industry’s first Perpetual Swap exchange. Gerry is deeply passionate about advancing decentralized finance, elevating user experience standards in Web3, and building products that empower global users with true ownership and financial freedom.
Interview1_ZH: Gerry Ho，您在Trust Wallet担任Head of Product期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Head of Product at Trust Wallet, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在多家交易平台负责产品和运营，从 BTCC 到 Binance.US 再到 Trust Wallet。你如何在产品设计时，把“专业交易者的需求”和“新手的可用性”统一在一个界面里？
Interview2_EN: Having led product and operations from BTCC to Binance.US and now Trust Wallet, how do you design interfaces that reconcile pro‑trader needs with newcomer usability?
Interview3_ZH: 你经历了现货、合约到 DeFi 的多次迭代。回顾下来，你最希望在早期就坚持的一条产品哲学是什么？
Interview3_EN: Having lived through spot, derivatives, and DeFi waves, what one product philosophy do you wish you had held onto even earlier in your career?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: 作为 First Digital 的首席运营官，Gunnar 为管理团队带来了产品开发专长和扎实的区块链技术理解。在 First Digital Trust，他负责搭建高效的运营基础设施、设计价值捕获模型、维护合作伙伴关系，并发掘可持续营收增长的新机会。
Biography_EN: As First Digital's Chief Operating Officer, Gunnar brings product development expertise and a thorough understanding of blockchain technology to the executive team. At First Digital Trust, Gunnar is responsible for building efficient operational infrastructure, developing value capture models, maintaining partnerships, and identifying new opportunities for sustainable revenue growth.
Interview1_ZH: Gunnar Jaerv，您在First Digital担任COO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the COO at First Digital, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 作为 First Digital 的 COO，你在托管与信托业务上积累了丰富经验。你如何向传统机构解释“链上透明”和“隐私保护”可以在托管架构中同时成立？
Interview2_EN: As COO at First Digital, you’ve seen custody and trust structures up close. How do you explain to traditional institutions that on‑chain transparency and privacy protection can coexist within a custody setup?
Interview3_ZH: 在你看来，未来五年数字资产托管业务中，最需要标准化却仍然缺位的一块，是技术接口、法律条款还是风险披露？
Interview3_EN: In your view, over the next five years which area in digital asset custody most urgently needs standardization but is still lacking: technical interfaces, legal language, or risk disclosure?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Guy Young 是 Ethena 的创始人兼首席执行官，拥有在投行、对冲基金和私募股权等岗位累计 6 年的投资经验。在创立 Ethena 之前，他在资产管理规模达 600 亿美元的 Cerberus Capital Management 及其关联公司工作 5 年，专注于对金融服务企业进行跨资本结构投资。
Biography_EN: Guy Young is the Founder & CEO of Ethena, with 6 years experience across investment banking, hedge fund, private equity investment roles. Prior to founding Ethena, spent 5 years at Cerberus Capital Management and its affiliates ($60bn AUM) investing in financial services businesses across the capital structure.
Interview1_ZH: Guy Young，您在Ethena Labs担任Founder期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Founder at Ethena Labs, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Ethena 搭建新型稳定资产和收益结构。你如何向监管者说明：这种“收益叠加的美元替代品”不会重演 2008 年影子银行的风险？
Interview2_EN: At Ethena you’re building new forms of synthetic dollars and yield structures. How do you explain to regulators that such “yield‑bearing dollar alternatives” are not simply recreating 2008‑style shadow banking risks?
Interview3_ZH: 从投行到对冲基金再到创业，你个人在风险管理上的思路经历了哪些关键转变？这些转变如何体现在 Ethena 的产品设计中？
Interview3_EN: From investment banking and hedge funds to founding Ethena, how has your personal approach to risk management changed, and how is that reflected in Ethena’s product design?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Henri Arslanian 是 Nine Blocks Capital Management 的联合创始人之一，该公司是全球规模最大的机构级加密对冲基金之一，也是首家获得迪拜 VARA 牌照的加密对冲基金。此前，他曾担任普华永道合伙人及全球加密业务负责人，创立并领导了由 25 个司法辖区、逾 250 名成员组成的全球加密团队。自 2015 年起，Henri 在香港大学担任兼任教授，开设全球最早的金融科技／加密大学课程之一。他也是 CNBC Arabia《Crypto Weekly》节目的主持人，每周覆盖逾 6,000 万家庭观众，并在多家私营与上市公司、以及多家监管机构和央行的顾问委员会任职。Henri 拥有超过 50 万 LinkedIn 关注者，是全球知名的主题演讲嘉宾和畅销书作者，其观点常见于 Bloomberg、CNBC、CNN、BBC、《华尔街日报》《经济学人》和《金融时报》等媒体。他出版了三本畅销加密相关书籍，包括《The Book of Crypto》（2022）、《The Future of Finance》（2019）以及儿童读物《Decoding Crypto with Henri & Hodler》（2024）。Henri 多次获奖：被 Onalytica 评为 LinkedIn 全球金融领域影响力第一人，被 Chambers Global 称为“香港最具知名度的金融科技顾问”，被 Blockchain Asset Review 评为“亚洲最具影响力的加密与区块链思想领袖”，并获 Asian Private Banker 颁发“年度金融科技变革者”奖。他是香港金融科技协会首任主席，并被香港高等法院委任为金融科技诉讼案件的专家证人。Henri 职业生涯起步于加拿大全球与香港的金融市场与基金律师，随后加入瑞银投资银行的主经纪及资本顾问团队。他能说英语、法语、亚美尼亚语、西班牙语和中文普通话，拥有清华大学中国法硕士学位以及由多所商学院联合授予的全球高阶工商管理硕士学位。
Biography_EN: Henri Arslanian is the co-founder of Nine Blocks Capital Management, one of the largest institutional-grade crypto hedge funds globally and the first crypto hedge fund to be licensed by Dubai's VARA. Previously, Henri was a partner and global crypto leader at PwC where he launched, grew and lead the PwC global crypto team composed of over 250 people in over 25 jurisdictions. He is an Adjunct Professor at the University of Hong Kong, where he has taught the first FinTech/crypto university course globally since 2015. Henri is also the host of the Crypto Weekly show on CNBC Arabia, which is viewed by over 60 million households each week. Henri serves on the board or advisory board of numerous private and public firms globally, including several regulatory and central bank advisory boards. With over 500,000 LinkedIn followers, Henri is a global keynote speaker, a best-selling published author, and is regularly featured in global media outlets such as Bloomberg, CNBC, CNN, BBC, The Wall Street Journal, The Economist, and the Financial Times. He was named by LinkedIn as one of the Global Top Voices in Finance and hosts the Crypto Capsules™ social media video series, as well as The Future of Money podcast and newsletter. Henri is the author of three best-selling crypto-related books including "The Book of Crypto" (Palgrave, 2022), "The Future of Finance" (Palgrave, 2019) and his recent children's book "Decoding Crypto with Henri & Hodler" (Brown Books Kids, 2024) Onalytica recognized Henri as the #1 most influential individual in Finance globally on LinkedIn, out of over 50,000 individuals working at top professional services and management consulting firms worldwide. Chambers Global named Henri the "highest profile FinTech consultant in Hong Kong." Blockchain Asset Review recognized him as the "Most Influential Crypto and Blockchain Thought Leader in Asia," and Asian Private Banker awarded him the "FinTech Changemaker of the Year" award. Henri was elected as the first Chairman of the FinTech Association of Hong Kong and appointed by the Hong Kong High Court as a court-appointed expert in FinTech litigation matters. Henri began his career as a financial markets and funds lawyer in Canada and Hong Kong before joining UBS Investment Bank's prime brokerage capital consulting team. Henri speaks five languages: English, French, Armenian, Spanish, and Mandarin Chinese. He holds a Masters in Chinese Law from Tsinghua University; a joint Global Executive MBA from Columbi
Interview1_ZH: Henri Arslanian，您在Nine Blocks Capital Management担任Co-Founder & Managing Partner期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder & Managing Partner at Nine Blocks Capital Management, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Nine Blocks 强调“机构级、市场中性”的策略。对普通投资者来说，你会如何解释这种策略与传统“多头做多加密”的根本区别？
Interview2_EN: At Nine Blocks you focus on institutional‑grade, market‑neutral strategies. For retail investors, how would you clearly explain how that differs from the classic “long‑only crypto” approach?
Interview3_ZH: 你曾在 PwC、学界和公众媒体频繁发声。现在回看，你觉得哪一类关于加密对传统金融影响的预测被严重低估，哪一类被严重高估？
Interview3_EN: Having worked at PwC, in academia, and in media, which predictions about crypto’s impact on traditional finance do you feel have been seriously under‑ and over‑estimated?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Herman Narula 是 Somnia 的创始人，该项目是一条面向企业打造的区块链；同时他也是 Improbable 的联合创始人兼首席执行官，这是一家专注大规模虚拟世界和仿真技术的先锋科技公司。自 2012 年创立 Improbable 以来，Herman 已筹集超过 7 亿美元融资，其中包括软银 5.02 亿美元的标志性投资，使公司估值超过 30 亿美元。他曾在 TED 演讲中讨论电子游戏的潜力，被视为沉浸式数字体验未来的重要声音。Herman 入选《福布斯》“30 Under 30”消费科技与企业科技两个榜单，并登上《星期日泰晤士报》富豪榜，同时著有《Virtual Society》一书，探讨虚拟世界对文化与社会的影响。他以对去中心化数字社区和元宇宙变革潜力的前瞻愿景而广受认可。
Biography_EN: Herman Narula is the founder of Somnia, a blockchain built for businesses, and the co-founder and CEO of Improbable, a pioneering tech company developing large-scale virtual worlds and simulations. Since founding Improbable in 2012, Herman has raised over $700 million in funding—featuring a landmark $502 million investment from SoftBank—pushing the company’s valuation beyond $3 billion. His work has positioned him as a leading voice in the future of immersive digital experiences, including presenting a TED Talk on video game potential.Named in Forbes’ “30 Under 30” in both Consumer and Enterprise Technology as well as last years’ Sunday Times Rich List, Narula is also the author of Virtual Society, a book exploring the cultural and social impact of virtual worlds. Herman is widely recognized for his vision of decentralized digital communities and the transformative potential of the metaverse.
Interview1_ZH: Herman Narula，您在Somnia & Improbable担任Founder & CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？

Interview2_EN: Through Improbable and Somnia you’re building large‑scale virtual worlds and on‑chain infra. Do you think the term “metaverse” is now outdated, and if you had to rebrand the concept, what would you call it?
Interview3_ZH: 你在 TED 和多本书中谈到虚拟社会。如果把一座虚拟城市完全部署在公链上，你最担心的不是技术，而是哪一个治理或经济学问题？
Interview3_EN: You wrote and spoke extensively about virtual societies. If an entire virtual city were run on a public chain, what governance or economic issue—not technical—would worry you the most?

Biography_ZH: Ian Allison 是 CoinDesk 的资深记者，主要报道机构和企业对加密货币及区块链技术的采用情况。在此之前，他曾在伦敦为《International Business Times》和《Newsweek》线上版报道金融科技。Ian 于 2017 年获得 State Street 数据与创新记者年度奖，次年再度入围；他还为 CoinDesk 赢得 2020 年 SABEW 商业新闻奖的荣誉提名。2022 年 11 月，他关于 FTX 的独家爆料导致该交易所和其创始人 Sam Bankman‑Fried 的垮台，该报道获得波克奖、洛贝尔奖以及纽约新闻俱乐部奖。Ian 毕业于爱丁堡大学。
Biography_EN: Ian Allison is a senior reporter at CoinDesk, focused on institutional and enterprise adoption of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. Prior to that, he covered fintech for the International Business Times in London and Newsweek online. He won the State Street Data and Innovation journalist of the year award in 2017, and was runner up the following year. He also earned CoinDesk an honourable mention in the 2020 SABEW Best in Business awards. His November 2022 FTX scoop, which brought down the exchange and its boss Sam Bankman-Fried, won a Polk award, Loeb award and New York Press Club award. Ian graduated from the University of Edinburgh.
Interview1_ZH: Ian Allison，您在CoinDesk担任Reporter期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？

Interview2_EN: Your investigative work played a key role in exposing FTX. Looking back, which “small clue” did most people overlook at the time but now seems glaringly important?

Biography_ZH: Ian De Bode 现任 Ondo Finance 总裁，拥有近十年为传统金融机构提供数字资产相关咨询的经验。加入 Ondo 之前，他在麦肯锡负责全球数字资产业务，帮助传统机构理解数字资产并落地具体产品与服务。Ian 拥有鲁汶大学电气工程学士、纳米科学与纳米技术硕士学位，以及斯坦福大学商学院 MBA 学位。
Biography_EN: Ian De Bode serves as the President of Ondo Finance and brings nearly a decade of experience working with traditional financial services companies on digital assets. Prior to joining Ondo, Ian led the digital asset efforts at McKinsey & Co., helping traditional institutions understand digital assets and launch specific products or services in the space. Ian holds a B.Sc. In Electrical Engineering, M.Sc. In NanoScience & Nanotechnology from the University of Leuven, and an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business.

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Irina Heaver 是 NeosLegal 的创始人，这是阿联酋首家“加密原生”律师事务所，同时也是《The Founder’s Guide to the UAE Crypto Laws》一书的作者。她为阿联酋多个监管框架（包括 VARA、SCA、ADGM 和 DIFC）下的虚拟资产服务提供商（VASP）牌照与合规提供全方位法律咨询。自 2016 年以来，她已为逾 300 个区块链和 Web3 项目设计结构方案，服务对象包括交易所、代币发行方、DeFi 平台以及 RWA 代币化项目。Irina 与监管机构紧密合作，参与虚拟资产立法制定，是进军阿联酋快速发展的加密生态的创业者、VC 与机构的深受信赖顾问。
Biography_EN: Irina Heaver is the founder of NeosLegal, the UAE’s first crypto-native law firm, and author of “The Founder’s Guide to the UAE Crypto Laws”. She advises on all aspects of VASP licensing and regulatory compliance across UAE regimes, including VARA, SCA, ADGM and DIFC. Since 2016, she has structured over 300 blockchain and Web3 projects, supporting exchanges, token issuers, DeFi platforms, and RWA tokenisation ventures. Irina works closely with regulators, contributing to the development of virtual asset laws, and is a trusted adviser to founders, VCs and institutions expanding into the UAE’s rapidly evolving crypto ecosystem.

Interview2_EN: At NeosLegal you’ve structured and advised hundreds of projects. What is the most common legal misconception you see among founders, and how much trouble could be avoided if it were corrected a year earlier?
Interview3_ZH: 你经常参与政策制定和公众教育。对中东和新兴市场来说，你认为哪一个监管原则最有机会直接跳过“欧美走过的弯路”？

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH:
Itai Elizur 是 MarketAcross 的联合创始人兼管理合伙人，同时也是 InboundJunction 和 Chainwire 的合伙人。MarketAcross 是 InboundJunction 集团旗下专注 Web3 的品牌传播机构，曾为超过 300 家区块链企业提供服务，其中包括 Binance、Solana 
、Polygon 、Crypto.com、Polkadot 、Tezos 、Avalanche 、KuCoin 和 eToro 等。Itai 帮助媒体集团、企业级公司及初创企业在数字领域制定并执行 360° 营销与增长战略，曾在 Wix、Infolinks 和 The Forward 担任内容、创意及市场相关职务，也是 BlockBuilders 的天使投资人，并曾在 500Global 特拉维夫办公室担任导师。
Biography_EN: Itai Elizur is the Co-Founder and Managing Partner at MarketAcross, and Partner at InboundJunction and Chainwire.MarketAcross is the Web3 branch of the InboundJunction group and has served over 300 blockchain companies, including Binance, Solana, Polygon, Crypto.com, Polkadot, Tezos, Avalanche, Kucoin, and eToro - to name a few.Itai has helped media groups, enterprise companies, and startups develop and execute 360° marketing and growth strategies in the digital space.Itai has worked in content, creative, and marketing roles at Wix, Infolinks, and The Forward. Itai is also an angel investor, investing at BlockBuilders, and was a mentor at 500Global’s Tel Aviv office.

Biography_ZH: Jacob（Yaqub）Hanna 教授于 2001 年在希伯来大学取得医学科学学士学位，2007 年获免疫学博士和临床医学博士（均为最高荣誉），随后在麻省理工学院从事博士后研究，并于 2011 年加入魏茨曼科学研究院分子遗传学系。Hanna 教授在成人细胞诱导幼稚多能性以及仅依靠干细胞在体外构建类整体胚胎发育模型方面处于世界领先地位。他揭示了重编程过程中的多条新通路，率先获得与小鼠等价的“原始型”人多能干细胞，这些细胞既可构建具有人体组织的跨物种嵌合小鼠模型，也可分化为人类原始生殖细胞（精子或卵子的前体），或形成包括胎盘和卵黄囊在内的全部胚外组织。他首次在“人工子宫”环境中，将哺乳动物胚胎从原肠胚形成前阶段在体外发育延长至晚期器官形成，并据此在培养皿中利用幼稚多能干细胞构建出高度逼真的小鼠和人类整体发育模型。他曾获 Sir Charles Clore 奖（2011）、Rappaport 生物医学研究奖（2013）、Wolf 基金会 Krill 奖（2013）和 Helen & Martin Kimmel 奖（2014），2014 年入选《Cell》“40 岁以下 40 位创新科学家”，2018 年成为 EMBO 会员，2021 年被《Prospect》杂志评为全球 50 位顶尖思想家之首，并于 2025 年因其在幼稚干细胞高保真胚胎模型方面的突破而获得人类前沿科学计划（HFSP）Nakasone 奖。
Biography_EN: Prof. Jacob (Yaqub) Hanna earned his BSc in medical science (2001), PhD in immunology (2007), and MD in clinical medicine summa cum laude (2007) from the Hebrew University. He conducted postdoctoral research at MIT. He joined the department of Molecular Genetics at the Weizmann Institute in 2011.Prof. Hanna is pioneering techniques in induced naïve pluripotency from adult cell and synthetic whole embryo-like developmental models made solely from stem cells ex utero for regenerating new organs and tissues. Induced pluripotent stem (iPS) cells have regenerative properties almost identical to those of embryonic stem cells but can be created from adult cells without using an egg or fetal material. Prof. Hanna has uncovered novel pathways regulating the reprogramming process and was the first to derive pristine “naïve” human pluripotent cells equivalent to those derived from mice and (i) can generate “cross-species humanized chimeric” mouse models that have human derived tissues (ii) can give rise to human primordial germ cell (progenitors of egg or sperm) or (iii) to all extra-embryonic compartments (placenta and yolk-sac). He was the first to expand prolonged periods of advanced and normal mammalian embryo development from pre-gastrulation until late organogenesis in an “artificial uterus” environment outside the maternal womb. The latter platform enabled him to demonstrate the ability to be the first to generate advanced stage & whole stem cell derived developmental models made entirely from naïve pluripotent stem cells in the petri dish in mice and human. He was awarded the Sir Charles Clore Prize (2011), a Rappaport Prize in biomedical research (2013), Krill Prize by the Wolf Foundation (2013), and the Helen and Martin Kimmel Award (2014). In 2014, he was featured among “40 under 40” innovative scientists by Cell journal and became EMBO member in 2018. In 2021, he ranked at the top of the list of 50 leading world thinkers by Prospect magazine. In 2025 he received the Nakasone award by the Human Frontiers Science Program for his groundbreaking work on naïve stem cell derived high fidelity embryo models.
Interview1_ZH: Jacob Hanna，您在RenewalBio INC.担任Co-Founder and Chief Scientific Advisor期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Co-Founder and Chief Scientific Advisor at RenewalBio INC., which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在干细胞与类胚胎模型上有突破性成果。作为科学家，你如何看待区块链和 DeSci 在科研数据共享与知识产权上的潜在作用？
Interview2_EN: You’ve made groundbreaking advances in stem cells and embryo‑like models. As a scientist, how do you see blockchain and DeSci helping with data sharing and intellectual property in research?
Interview3_ZH: 如果未来真的可以在实验室中大规模“打印器官”，你认为社会在监管和伦理上的最大难题会是什么？这与今天围绕 AI 的担忧有哪些相似之处？
Interview3_EN: If we one day mass‑produce organs in the lab, what do you see as the biggest regulatory and ethical challenge, and how does it resemble today’s debates around AI?

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Jeff Liu 是 Solayer 的首席执行官兼 Fuzzland 联合创始人，带领团队开发全球首个硬件加速区块链 InfiniSVM。凭借超过 20 年企业软件经验，他多次从零到一建设并领导跨行业产品团队。Jeff 的职业生涯始于 Siebel Systems（后被 Oracle 以 50 亿美元收购），随后成为 VMware 核心基础设施团队早期成员；2012 年，他共同创立 LBS 社交数据聚合平台 Portaura，后被阿里巴巴收购，并担任 Veridise 首席运营官。他拥有卡内基梅隆大学工商管理学位以及上海交通大学计算机工程学位。
Biography_EN: Jeff Liu is the CEO of Solayer and Co-Founder of Fuzzland, leading the development of InfiniSVM — the world’s first hardware-accelerated blockchain. With more than 20 years of experience in enterprise software, he has built and led product teams from 0 to 1 across multiple industries. Jeff began his career at Siebel Systems (acquired by Oracle for $5B) and was an early member of VMware’s Core Infrastructure team. In 2012, he co-founded Portaura, an LBS social data aggregation platform later acquired by Alibaba, and served as COO of Veridise. He holds degrees in Business Management from Carnegie Mellon University and Computer Engineering from Shanghai Jiao Tong University.

Biography_ZH: Jess 是 WalletConnect 的首席执行官，该公司是金融互联网的连接层。此前，她在全球金融科技公司 Checkout.com 负责加密业务，并曾是英国央行 CBDC 参与论坛成员，以及 UK Finance 新型数字货币指导小组、Innovate Finance 金融科技战略小组和英国国际贸易部金融科技小组的成员。
Biography_EN: Jess is the CEO of WalletConnect, the connective layer for the financial internet. Previously she led Crypto at Checkout.com, a global fintech company. Jess was also a member of the Bank of England CBDC Engagement Forum and a member of UK Finance New Digital Money Steering Group, Innovate Finance Fintech Strategy Group and Department for International Trade Fintech Group
Interview1_ZH: Jess Houlgrave，您在WalletConnect担任CEO期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the CEO at WalletConnect, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?

Interview2_EN: From TradFi to NFTs, payments, and now CEO of WalletConnect, how do you define the real, everyday value of “digital ownership” for mainstream users in 2025 beyond collectibles and profile pictures?
Interview3_ZH: 作为连接层公司负责人，你对“多链未来”的看法有什么变化？你现在更看重的是链之间的资产桥，还是身份与权限的互通？
Interview3_EN: As the leader of a connectivity layer, how has your view of a “multi‑chain future” evolved—do you now prioritize asset bridges between chains, or interoperability of identity and permissions?

Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Interview1_EN: As the Binance Angel at your team, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?

Biography_ZH: 作为首席商务官，Johann 负责协调所有希望基于 Chainlink  构建的开发者和协议的接入流程。采用 Chainlink 的项目覆盖 DeFi、NFT、游戏、保险等广泛的去中心化应用领域；自 2019 年以来，他即参与使用 Chainlink 推动 DeFi 发展的进程，与 Aave、Synthetix 等现已成为行业领军者的协议密切合作。他坚信区块链与混合智能合约将重塑现代金融体系以及人类与之互动的方式。
Biography_EN: As Chief Business Officer, Johann oversees the integration process for developers and protocols looking to build with Chainlink. Projects implementing Chainlink span a vast array of decentralized applications, including decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, gaming, insurance, and more. Johann has been involved in shaping the DeFi space through the use of Chainlink since its inception in 2019, when he worked with now-leading DeFi protocols like Aave and Synthetix. He is a firm believer that blockchain technology and hybrid smart contracts are set to revolutionize modern financial systems and our relationships with them.
Interview1_ZH: Johann Eid，您在Chainlink Labs担任Chief Business Officer期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Chief Business Officer at Chainlink Labs, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Chainlink 负责商务和生态拓展，从 DeFi 到 RWA 都在用预言机。站在今天，你觉得哪个新领域会成为预言机需求的“下一条 S 曲线”？
Interview2_EN: As Chief Business Officer at Chainlink, you’ve seen oracles power everything from DeFi to RWAs. From today’s vantage point, which new vertical do you think will generate the next S‑curve of oracle demand?
Interview3_ZH: 当你和机构客户讨论混合智能合约时，你会用什么样的真实案例证明：链上与链下数据结合能创造传统系统完全做不到的东西？
Interview3_EN: When talking to institutions about hybrid smart contracts, what real‑world example do you use to show that combining on‑ and off‑chain data enables something legacy systems simply cannot do?
Interview4_ZH: 面向Binance Blockchain Week Dubai的全球观众，您认为2025年Web3/区块链生态中最大的突破机会会出现在何处？
Interview4_EN: For the Binance Blockchain Week Dubai audience, where do you see the biggest breakthrough opportunities in the Web3/blockchain ecosystem for 2025?

Biography_ZH: Joseph Wang 现任 Google Cloud  云端 AI 解决方案负责人，是应用人工智能领域专家。他拥有哥伦比亚大学物理学博士学位，在 Amazon  和 Google 等公司领导团队构建机器学习与生成式 AI 解决方案，应用于个性化营销、运营效率提升以及从零构建创新 AI 系统等场景。
Biography_EN: Joseph Wang is Head of Cloud AI Solutions at Google Cloud and an expert in applied artificial intelligence. He holds a Ph.D. in Physics from Columbia University and has a proven track record of leading teams to deliver impactful business solutions using Machine Learning and Generative AI. His past work at companies like Amazon and Google includes developing solutions for personalized marketing, operational efficiency, and building novel AI systems from the ground up.
Interview1_ZH: Joseph Wang，您在Google Cloud担任Head of Cloud AI Solutions期间，哪一个项目或战略最能体现您当前的关注点？能与我们分享背后的关键洞察吗？
Interview1_EN: As the Head of Cloud AI Solutions at Google Cloud, which recent project or strategy best captures your current focus, and what insights can you share from it?
Interview2_ZH: 你在 Google Cloud 负责 AI 解决方案，也有一线物理和机器学习背景。你如何看待“加密 × AI”在企业级场景中的真正落地点，而不是只停留在概念？
Interview2_EN: As Head of Cloud AI Solutions at Google Cloud with a physics and ML background, where do you see the most realistic enterprise intersections of crypto and AI, beyond buzzwords?

Interview2_EN: As the global BD lead for Binance Square, you work with projects, media, and KOLs. How do you decide whether a creator has true “long‑term partnership value” rather than just short‑term traffic?
